name: Aggressive Behavior
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Leadership and Weapons>8, randomly select a personnel to be killed, all your other personnel are stopped, and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Alien Abduction
text: Unless you have 2 Engineer and Physics or Medical and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Antedean Assassins
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Telepathy, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Telepathy personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to it's dilemma pile.

name: Armus Roulette
text: Randomly select four personnel. Unless they have Cunning>22 or one of them has Cunning>7, your opponent chooses one of them to be killed, then the other three are stopped.

name: Assassin's Blade
text: Unless you have 2 Security or Cunning>26, your opponent chooses a personnel (except an Android or a Shape-shifter) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Assassination Attempt
text: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who does not have Treachery is killed.

name: Authenticate Artifacts
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Archaeology, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Archaeology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Automated Weapons
text: Unless you have 2 Security or a Hand Weapon, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Berserk Changeling
text: Unless you have 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 3 Security or two Hand Weapons, randomly select a personnel (except a Changeling) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Blended
text: Unless you have Diplomacy or Telepathy, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Diplomacy or Telepathy, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Center of Attention
text: Unless you have 3 Security or a Hand Weapon and Cunning>28 or {Quark}, your opponent chooses a Treachery personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Chula: Echoes
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the highest Cunning among those personnel is even, all three of them are stopped.

name: Chula: Pick One to Save Two
text: Randomly select three personnel. Choose to return one of those personnel to its owner's hand or to have all three of them be stopped.

name: Command Decisions
text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Console Overload
text: Unless you have 2 Engineer or 2 Programming, choose a personnel who has Medical or Science to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Contamination
text: Unless you have Engineer and Physics or 2 Exobiology, all your Medical personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Damaged Reputation
text: If you have Integrity>50, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Intelligence and 2 Treachery or Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
text: Unless you have 2 Science and 2 Security or 3 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Debris Field
text: Unless you have Astrometrics or Navigation, all your Engineer personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Drumhead
text: Unless you have Law, randomly select a personnel who has Integrity<4 to be placed in its owner's discard pile. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Enemy Boarding Party
text: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel who has Strength<6 is killed.

name: Equipment Malfunction
text: Return all your equipment to their owner's hands.

name: Explosive Decompression
text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

name: Gravimetric Distortion
text: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics or 3 Engineer or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Graviton Ellipse
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Physics or Shields + unused Range this turn>13, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Hunter Gangs
text: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who has Cunning+Strength<11 is killed.

name: Impressive Trophies
text: Unless you have Cunning>32, your personnel who has the highest cost is placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Invidium Leak
text: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Medical, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Kelvan Show of Force
text: Your opponent chooses two personnel (except an Android or a Hologram). Randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Kolaran Raiders
text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Security to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Limited Welcome
text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped. Place this dilemma on this mission. When you attempt this mission again, after your opponent draws dilemmas, he or she may take this dilemma and add it to those drawn.

name: Maglock
text: Unless you have 3 Officer or 3 Programming, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Magnetic Field Disruptions
text: Choose a personnel who has Astrometrics or Navigation to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Microbrain
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Exobiology or a personnel who has 2 Geology, your opponent chooses an Exobiology or Geology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Misguided Activist
text: Randomly select a [Cmd] personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Honor or 2 Security or {Miles O'Brien}, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Nanite Attack
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Engineer or 2 Security and a Hand Weapon, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the end of each of your turns, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: None Shall Pass
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 3 Diplomacy or Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Ornaran Threat
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and Medical or 2 Security, that personnel is killed instead, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Personal Duty
text: Unless you have Leadership or Officer, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Leadership or Officer, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Pinned Down
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be stopped.

name: Planetary Survey
text: Choose a personnel who has Geology or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Primitive Culture
text: Unless you have Anthropology and Leadership or 3 Diplomacy or 2 Intelligence or four personnel who each have Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pursuit Just Behind
text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

name: Quarren Labor Shortage
text: Unless at least half your personnel are not [NA], all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Recurring Injury
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Biology or a personnel who has 2 Medical, your opponent chooses an Biology or Medical personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Skullduggery
text: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Acquisition or Treachery, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Stellar Core Fragment
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Physics or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses an Physics or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Sympathetic Magic
text: Unless you choose to place this dilemma on your ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

name: Systems Diagnostic
text: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temptation
text: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel that does not have Honor or Treachery is stopped.

name: Tense Negotiations
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Leadership, your opponent chooses an Diplomacy or Leadership personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Trabe Grenade
text: Randomly select a personnel who has Leadership or Security. If that personnel has Cunning<7, he or she is killed.

name: Triage
text: Choose a personnel who has Biology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Unscientific Method
text: The most Cunning Science personnel who does not have Treachery is killed. Unless you have Cunning>24 remaining, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Vastly Outnumbered
text: If you have Strength>55, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have Anthropology and 2 Honor or two Hand Weapons or Integrity>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Wavefront
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Astrometrics or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, your opponent chooses an Astrometrics or Navigation personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Alien Gambling Device
text: When a random selection is made at this mission, you may ignore its result and select again. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bajoran Phaser Pistol
text: While in combat, each of your [Baj] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Cardassian Phaser Pistol
text: While in combat, each of your [Car] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Engineering Kit
text: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Physics.

name: Engineering PADD
text: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Astrometrics.

name: Klingon Disruptor Pistol
text: While in combat, each of your [Kli] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Medical Kit
text: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Biology.

name: Medical Tricorder
text: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Exobiology.

name: Romulan Disruptor Pistol
text: While in combat, each of your [Rom] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Science PADD
text: Each of your Science personnel present gains Archaeology.

name: Starfleet Type-2 Phaser
text: While in combat, each of your [Fed] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Tricorder
text: Each of your Science personnel present gains Geology.

name: A Chance for Glory
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

name: A Treasure Beyond Comparison
text: Plays in your core. When you place an opponent's personnel in your brig, you may draw a card.

name: Astrometrics Lab
text: Plays in your core. Order - Discard a card from hand to make your ship with your Astrometrics personnel aboard Range +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Awaiting Trial
text: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a captive, you may draw a card.

name: Back-Flush Bussard Collectors
text: To play this event, you must command a [Fed] Engineer personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: BaH!
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Bajoran Gratitude Festival
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Remove up to four cards in your discard pile from the game, then draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

name: Battle Drills
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your ship with your Gul aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Blind Spot
text: Plays on your ship. When an opponent's ship moves away from this mission, this ship may follow using its Range from your next turn.

name: Brutal Struggle
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Cry "Havoc!"
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Days of Atonement
text: To play this event, you must command a [Baj] Anthropology personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Diplomatic Overture
text: Plays on a mission, if your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel is at that mission. While a Diplomacy personnel is at this mission, that personnel's owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her skills.

name: Engage Cloak
text: Plays in your core. You may execute only one order using this event each turn. Order - If there is no ship on this event, place your staffed ship that has a Cloaking Device on this event (While a ship is here, this event cannot leave play.) Order - If a ship is on this event, place that ship at any mission. That ship's Range for this turn is used.

name: Feast on the Dying
text: Examine the top two cards of your deck. You may replace either or both of them with a card from your discard pile, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: For All Our Sons
text: Plays on {Cardassia Prime}. At the start of each of your turns, if your Gul or Legate is at a different mission, you may examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other.

name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus?
text: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

name: Inspiring Leader
text: Plays on your ship (limit one per ship). While you have this ship's Commander aboard, it is Range +2.

name: Just Like Old Times
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, score 15 points.

name: Labor Camp
text: Plays on your planet mission. At the start of each of your turns, if your [Car] personnel is on this planet and you have a captive, score 10 points.

name: Let Honor Guide You
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Honor personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Line of Defense
text: Plays in your core. While your ship is at a mission that has a matching affiliation icon, it is Shields +2.

name: Nelvana Trap
text: Plays on an opponent's mission. When an opponent moves a ship to this mission, you may destroy this event to take each [Rom] ship from your copies of {Engage Cloak}, place them at this mission, and begin an engagement involving them. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: No Love for the Spoon Heads
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Baj] personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved and you may destroy an event.

name: No Peace in Our Time
text: Plays in your core. Each of your [Kli] Treachery personnel is Cunning +2. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] Treachery personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Nothing That Happens is Truly Random
text: To play this event, you must command a [Fed] Diplomacy personnel. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. An opponent chooses one of those cards to be discarded, then you take the other two into hand. Destroy this event.

name: "Observer" from the Obsidian Order
text: To play this event, you must command a [Car] personnel who has Leadership or Intelligence. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Peacemaker or Predator?
text: Examine a number of cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of [Rom] Leadership personnel you command. Replace those cards in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Pierce Their Defenses
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Shields -2.

name: Point Blank Strike
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +4. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2.

name: Precise Attack
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Range -2.

name: Prejudice and Politics
text: Plays in your core. Order - If your Praetor or Senator is on {Romulus}, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that opponent places that card in his or her hand. Otherwise, score 5 points, and that opponent places that card on the bottom of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Process Identification
text: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Examine the top five cards of your deck. Take one of those cards into hand and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Rescue Captives
text: Discard any number of cards from hand to take an equal number of your personnel from your opponents' brigs and place them on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Resistance Tactics
text: Plays in your core. When combat or an engagement involving your [Baj] card begins, you may destroy this event to prevent that combat or engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

name: Romulan Intelligence Network
text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a [Rom] personnel at an opponent's planet mission, you may examine the top two cards of that opponent's deck. Place one of those cards on the bottom of that deck and the other one on top.

name: Standard Cardassian Procedure
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Car] ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: Tactical Planning
text: To play this event, you must command a [Rom] Security personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Taken Prisoner
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Car] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: Tapestry
text: Remove all the cards in your deck from the game. Take all the personnel and ships from your discard pile and shuffle them to form a new deck. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: The Orion Underworld
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [NA] ship with your Thief aboard. If you win, score 10 points.

name: The Pillage of Bajor
text: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other. Destroy this event.

name: The Reman Mines
text: Plays on Supervise Dilithium Mine. Each of your [Rom] ships is Range +1 for each Reman you command (limit +3).

name: To Boldly Go
text: To play this event, you must have completed a planet mission and a space mission. Plays in your core. When any of your [Fed] personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to prevent that.

name: Alternate Identity
text: Order - Replace a [Rom] personnel you command with a [Rom] personnel from your hand. Place the personnel you replaced in your discard pile.

name: Amanda Rogers
text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Lose 5 points.

name: Arrest Order
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Car] Security personnel equipped with a hand weapon at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Stop that personnel to randomly select an opponent's personnel present to place in your brig.

name: Comfort Women
text: When your Gul or Legate is attempting a mission, he or she gains one skill from your non-[Car] personnel at that mission. Also, each of your Guls and Legates involved is attributes +1. These effects last until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Condition Captive
text: Order - Place your captive on your headquarters mission. You now command that personnel.

name: Dimensional Shifting
text: Order - Discard a random card from hand to place any number of your personnel and equipment at one mission aboard any ship at the same mission.

name: Empathic Touch
text: When your personnel is about to be killed, if your Telepathy personnel is present, stop both personnel to prevent that.

name: Escape
text: When any number of your personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed or placed in an opponent's brig, discard a random card from hand to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
text: When your ship with your Navigation personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

name: Kevin Uxbridge
text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. Order - Destroy an event. Lose 5 points.

name: Lasting Peace
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Baj] Diplomacy personnel. Order - Place an equal number of [Baj] personnel and non-[Baj] personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

name: Mission Briefing
text: When your [Fed] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your stopped [Fed] personnel at the same mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Power to the Shields
text: When your ship with your Engineer personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

name: Protection of the Tal Shiar
text: When your non-Intelligence [Rom] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she is attributes +1 and gains all skills on one of your [Rom] Intelligence personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Pursuit Course
text: When an opponent's ship moves away from a mission where you have a staffed ship, place that ship at the mission the opponent's ship moves to.

name: Quantum Slipstream Drive
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a ship with your Engineer personnel aboard. Order - That ship is Range +4 until the end of this turn.

name: Render Assistance
text: When an engagement involving your ship begins, another one of your ships at that mission joins the engagement.

name: Secret Conspiracy
text: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, add the skills (except Intelligence) of your [Rom] Intelligence personnel at that mission to the mission's requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent's turn.

name: Sensor Sweep
text: To play this interrupt, you must command an Astrometrics personnel. Order - Download a Pursuit card.

name: Sermon
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a personnel who has Anthropology and Leadership. When an opponent plays an event, place a random card from hand on top of your deck to prevent that event and place it on top of that opponent's deck.

name: Shady Resources
text: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your other Treachery personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Souls of the Dead
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Order - Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Symbol of Devotion
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a Kai, Prylar, or Vedek. Order - Download a [Baj] personnel, then place the Kai, Prylar, or Vedek you command on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Promise
text: When your [Kli] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills and attributes on a [Kli] personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: The Tides of Fortune
text: When your non-Consume space dilemma is revealed from your dilemma stack, if your staffed [Rom] ship is at that mission, that ship and your personnel aboard it face that dilemma instead. Score 10 points.

name: Ties of Blood and Water
text: When your [Baj] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills on a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Torture
text: You may play only one copy of this interrupt each turn. Order - Choose one of your captives. Each of your Intelligence personnel gains that captive's skills until the end of your turn.

name: Twist of Fate
text: When your [Rom] personnel is about to be killed, randomly select another of your personnel present to be killed instead.

name: Abduction Plot
skills: Transporters, Treachery, Cunning>34, and (Intelligence and Leadership or Law and Officer)

name: Access Relay Station
skills: 2 Programming, Cunning>34, and (Engineer and Officer or Intelligence and Security)

name: Acquire Illicit Explosives
skills: Physics, Treachery, Cunning>30, and (Astrometrics or Engineer)

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Amnesty Talks
skills: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Law and Integrity>31 or Leadership, Security, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>36

name: Bajor Gift of the Prophets
skills: You may play [Baj] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World
skills: You may play [Car] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Cargo Rendezvous
skills: Engineer, Physics, Transporters, and Integrity>29 or Acquisition, Transporters, Treachery, and Cunning>34

name: Colony Preparations
skills: Biology, Geology, Science, Security, and Strength>34

name: Deliver Supplies
skills: Navigation, Transporters, Strength>28, and (Acquisition or Honor)

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation
skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Home of Starfleet Command
skills: You may play [Fed][DS9] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Eliminate Harvesters
skills: Exobiology, Medical, Programming, and Integrity>27 or Intelligence, Medical, Treachery, and Cunning>28

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Deneb IV Encounter at Farpoint
skills: Exobiology, Honor, Telepathy, and Integrity>25 or Acquisition, Diplomacy, Treachery, and Cunning>30

name: Evacuate Colony
skills: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Honor and Integrity>31 or Officer, Security, 2 Treachery, and Strength>34
text: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Explore Black Cluster
skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Extraction
skills: Biology, Medical, Treachery, Cunning>36, and (Diplomacy or Intelligence)

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Feldomite Rush
skills: Engineer, Geology, Cunning>28, and (Acquisition or Law or 2 Treachery)

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Fissure Research
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Science, and Cunning>36

name: Lapideas System Geological Survey
text: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Acquisition or 2 Geology, score 5 points.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Host Metaphasic Shielding Test
skills: Diplomacy, Engineer, Navigation, Science, and Integrity>29

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Hunt for DNA Program
skills: 2 Archaeology, 2 Biology, Leadership, Programming, Cunning>44, and (Honor or Treachery)

name: Intercept Maquis
text: You cannot complete this mission using a ship that has a [Maq] personnel aboard.

name: Intercept Renegade
skills: 2 Intelligence, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>34 or 2 Leadership, Officer, Security, and Integrity>33

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Investigate Alien Probe
Investigate Coup
skills: Leadership, Navigation, Officer, Security, and Strength>36

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Investigate Rogue Comet
skills: Anthropology, Archaeology, Engineer, Programming, and Cunning>34

name: Investigate Sighting
skills: Exobiology, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>28 or 2 Telepathy and Integrity>29

name: Khitomer Investigation
skills: Programming, Security, Cunning>32, and (2 Honor or 2 Treachery)

name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous
text: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your Hand Weapons aboard the completing ship in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Mining Survey
skills: Engineer, Geology, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9
skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Pegasus Search
skills: 2 Astrometrics, Engineer, 2 Navigation, Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>44

name: Quest for the Sword of Kahless
skills: Archaeology, Leadership, 2 Science, Strength>38 and (Honor or Treachery)

name: Cardassia IV Rescue Prisoners
text: When you complete this mission, you may take one of your personnel from an opponent's brig and place him or her on your headquarters mission.

name: Romulus Seat of Power
skills: You may play [Rom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Runabout Search
skills: Medical, Science, Transporters, Cunning>32, and (Acquisition or Honor)
text: When you complete this mission, if your ship is at this mission, you may take a [Baj] personnel or a [Fed] personnel from your discard pile and place it aboard that ship.

name: Search and Rescue
text: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet.

name: Search for Survivors
skills: Leadership, Officer, Programming, Security, and Strength>36

name: Sensitive Search
skills: Programming, Security, Cunning>30, and (Acquisition or Honor or Law or Treachery)

name: Study Cometary Cloud
skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, Programming, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Security)

name: Surgery Under Fire
skills: Biology, Leadership, Medical, Officer, and Strength>36

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Uncover DNA Clues
Wormhole Negotiations
skills: Astrometrics, Cunning>42, and (3 Diplomacy and 2 Honor or Telepathy and 3 Treachery)

name: Bralek
text: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

name: Keldon Advanced
text: While your [Car] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Prakesh
text: While this ship is in an engagement you did not begin, it is Shields +4.

name: Reklar
text: While you have a captive, this ship is Weapons +2 and Shields +1.

name: Vetar
text: When you play this ship, you may download a Pursuit card.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Prototype Warship
text: While this ship is in an engagement, it is Weapons +1 and Shields +2.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Federation Envoy
text: When you complete a [Fed] planet mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: I.K.S. Lukara
text: While your [Kli] personnel at this mission is in combat, you may add this ship's Weapons to your total Strength.

name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears
text: For each Honor Klingon aboard this ship, it is Weapons +1 (limit +3).

name: Deranas
text: While this ship is at a Region: Neutral Zone mission, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +2.

name: Haakona
text: When you play this ship, you may download {Engage Cloak} or a Pursuit card.

name: Scimitar Predator
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser discards the top card or his or her deck.

name: Serrola
text: While your [Rom] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2. While this ship is at a [GQ] mission, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +1.

name: Valdore
text: When an opponent begins an engagement involving your other ship, if this ship is on your {Engage Cloak}, you may place this ship at that mission to join that engagement.

name: A Klingon Matter
text: Unless you have 2 Intelligence and Treachery or 2 Leadership and Cunning>32, randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength<7, he or she is killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Casualties of War
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Crippling Attack
text: Unless you have 2 Leadership and Officer or 2 Navigation and Shields>6, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Dedication to Duty
text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, your opponent draws a number of cards equal to the number of [SD] icons on that personnel.

name: Disgraceful Assault
text: Unless you have 2 Security and Transporters, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Biology and 2 Medical, that personnel is killed instead, then all your personnel are stopped.

name: Disruptor Accident
text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, he or she and a second randomly selected personnel are stopped.

name: DNA Security Scan
text: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Security and Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Exposed Power Relay
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is killed instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to be killed.

name: Face to Face
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Flim-Flam Artist
text: Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Programming or Law and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped, your opponent may draw a card, and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Head to Head
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Hired Muscle
text: Unless you have 2 Acquisition or choose to discard three cards from hand, your opponent chooses a [NA] personnel to be placed on top of his owner's deck.

name: Houdini Mines
text: Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Science or 2 Programming and 3 Security, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Meaningless Words
text: Unless you choose to discard the top three cards of your deck, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Memory Invasion
text: Your opponent examines your hand and chooses a card. Unless you choose to discard that card, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Nausicaan Pirates
text: Unless you have Leadership and 2 Security or 2 Treachery and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Picking Up the Pieces
text: Unless you have Geology or Programming, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Geology or Programming, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Plasma Shock
text: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength>6, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Quaint Technology
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Programming or 2 Diplomacy and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Racial Tension
text: Randomly select two personnel. Unless they are the same species, both are stopped.

name: Sorting Things Out
text: If a personnel has been killed during this mission attempt, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Stolen Computer Core
text: Unless you have Intelligence and Transporters or 2 Security and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - While a Programming personnel is aboard this ship, his or her owners must discard a card from hand to use that programming.

name: Subspace Accident
text: Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Physics and Science, randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Telepathic Deception
text: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, and Security or Telepathy and Cunning>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Timescape
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Training Accident
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Traitor Exposed
text: Randomly select a Treachery personnel. If that personnel has Cunning>6, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Unexpected
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Diplomacy or Exobiology and 2 Medical, place that personnel on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Assassination Plot
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and return your Assassin to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Assassin.

name: Born for Conquest
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Brief Reunion
text: To play this event, you must command {Cardassia Prime}. Download a unique [Car] personnel, then place him or her on your Cardassia Prime. At the end of this turn, kill that personnel. Destroy this event.

name: Cargo Run
text: Plays on your space mission. Add Acquisition to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

name: Common Ground
text: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Starting with the player to your left, each player may place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. (Yours must be a [TNG] personnel.) Destroy this event.

name: Complications
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Confessions in the Pale Moonlight
text: Plays in your core. While your [Fed][DS9] Treachery personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Conscription
text: Download two Glinns, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Crowd Control
text: Plays in your core. When a player is about to play a personnel who costs 1, if that player has played exactly one other personnel who costs 1 during this turn, that personnel is cost +2.

name: Deep Roots
text: Plays in your core. When you play a Bajoran Resistance personnel, you may destroy this event to destroy an event.

name: Disable Sensors
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: Ferocity
text: Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel, you may destroy this event to randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: For the Cause
text: Plays on {Athos IV}. You may attempt and complete Region: Demilitarized Zone missions using your [Maq] personnel (and a ship they are aboard at a space mission), regardless of effects preventing [Maq] personnel (or ships those personnel are aboard) from doing so, with these requirements: Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>36.

name: For The Sisko
text: Plays in your core. Order - If you command three [Baj] personnel, discard a non-personnel card from hand to place two [Baj] personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

name: Heart of Glory
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: Kotra
text: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent discards a personnel from the top of his or her deck during your turn, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Legal Proceedings
text: Plays on your planet mission. Add Law to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

name: Life Support
text: Take a personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your headquarters mission where he or she could be played. At the end of this turn, remove that personnel from the game. Destroy this event.

name: Machinations
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma that costs no more than the number of dilemmas you removed. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down. Place the chosen dilemma on the top of your dilemma stack.

name: Mental Discipline
text: Plays in your core. When your unique personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a personnel with the same card title from hand to make him or her attributes +1 and gain one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Peldor Joi
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Take a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. Each of your opponents may take a personnel from his or her discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

name: Personal Forcefield
text: Name a unique personnel you command. For the rest of this turn, when he or she is about to be killed by a dilemma, prevent that. Destroy this event.

name: Picking Up the Basics
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop one of your [TNG] personnel to make one of your other [TNG] personnel present gain all of that stopped personnel's skills until the end of this turn.

name: Pickpocket
text: To play this event, you must command a Thief. Plays in your core. Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, destroy this event. Otherwise, each of your Thieves is attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Political Leverage
text: Choose an opponent's personnel aboard a ship at the same mission as your staffed [Car] ship. Place that personnel in your brig. That opponent may discard the top four cards of his or her deck to prevent this. Destroy this event.

name: Power to the Weapons
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: Rash Aggression
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Baj] Treachery personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's personnel involved to be killed.

name: Reconfiguration
text: To play this event, you must command two Engineer personnel. Shuffle any player's deck to draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: Retaliation
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your three [Maq] personnel present together at a non-headquarters mission to place an opponent's personnel present in your brig.

name: Salvaging the Wreckage
text: Take up to four personnel and ship cards from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: Shadow Operation
text: To play this event, you must command two [Rom] Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Rom] personnel who costs 3, if you have played no other personnel this turn and your staffed ship is at an opponent's non-headquarters mission, that personnel is cost -2.

name: Sickbay
text: To play this event, you must command a Medical personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of your turn, destroy this event. When your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if you command a ship at the same mission, place that personnel on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Smuggling Run
text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if your Smuggler is at an opponent's non-headquarters mission, that opponent has no ship at that mission, and your personnel at that mission have its requirements, you may destroy this event to score 10 points.

name: Staunch Determination
text: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is killed in an engagement involving your [Car] ship, you may destroy this event to make that opponent discard a number of cards from the top of his or her deck equal to that personnel's cost.

name: Straying from the Path
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. If you have fewer cards in your discard pile than in your hand, exchange your discard pile with your hand. Remove this event from the game.

name: Temba, His Arms Wide
text: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a personnel, you may give command of this event to the player on your right to make that personnel cost -3 (move this event to his or her core).

name: The Text of the Kosst Amojan
text: To play this event, you must command {Bajor} and no other headquarters mission. Plays in your core. Order - Stop your Kai or one of your [Baj] Treachery personnel to choose two non-Prophet cards from your discard pile. Choose an opponent to choose one of those cards to place in your hand and one to remove from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Under Scrutiny
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. While that personnel is attempting a mission, his or her owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her skills.

name: Unexpected Difficulties
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to return them to your dilemma pile and draw an equal number of dilemmas.

name: Unseen Manipulations
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] Treachery personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent begins the Execute Orders segment of his or her turn, if that opponent has not drawn two cards or played a ship this turn, he or she discards the top two cards of his or her deck.

name: Vast Resources
text: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Kill your captive to draw a number of cards equal to that captive's cost. Destroy this event.

name: Visionary
text: To play this event, you must command two [DS9] Engineer personnel. Plays in your core. When you draw a card, you may discard that card to draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: We Will Not Surrender
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

name: Bank Heist
text: When your Thief is facing a dilemma, choose an opponent to reveal the top three cards of his or her deck. That Thief gains one skill from each personnel revealed until the end of that dilemma. Replace those cards in the same order.

name: Coordinated Attack
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Kli] Officer personnel. Order - Download an Assault or Maneuver card.

name: Diplomatic Masquerade
text: When your [Rom] Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that [Rom] personnel gains the revealed personnel's skills until the end of this dilemma.

name: Discreet Inquiry
text: When your [Fed][DS9] personnel is attempting a mission, reveal a personnel from hand to make him or her gain one of the revealed personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt. Place the revealed personnel on top of your deck.

name: Emergency Treatment
text: When your unique personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if your Medical personnel is present, that unique personnel is stopped instead. That dilemma's owner may draw three cards.

name: Fresh Tactic
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls. Order - Download a Capture or Punishment card.

name: Honorable Death
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a unique [Kli] personnel present with an opponent's personnel. Order - Kill that [Kli] personnel to destroy an opponent's event.

name: If Wishes Were Horses
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to download an event, then discard a random card from hand.

name: Powerful Example
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Order - Destroy your event to make each of your opponents destroy an event he or she commands.

name: Precautionary Measures
text: When your [DS9] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, stop one of your [E] personnel present to prevent that.

name: Relentless
text: When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard an interrupt from hand to prevent that.

name: Shared Delicacy
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls and have a captive. Order - Reveal a random card from that captive's owner's hand. He or she chooses to discard that card or discard the top three cards of his or her deck.

name: Stricken Dumb
text: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make that personnel lose all his or her skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Team of Ambassadors
text: When your Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Integrity instead.

name: The Truth of War
text: When you win combat, the loser discards the top two cards of his or her deck.

name: Vile Deception
text: When an opponent's personnel is attempting a mission, if your Romulan is at that mission, that opponent chooses to reveal his or her hand and discard all interrupts revealed or chooses two of his or her personnel involved in that mission attempt to be stopped.

name: Vision of Violence
text: When your [Baj] personnel is in combat, add the Strength of a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile to your total Strength.

name: We Are Klingon
text: When your [Kli] personnel is attempting a mission, he or she is Strength +1 until the end of that mission attempt (or +3 if you command {Kahless}).

name: Well-Crafted Lure
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Car] Law personnel at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Randomly select an opponent's non-unique personnel present. You may discard a number of cards from hand equal to that personnel's cost to place him or her in your brig.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Aid Clone Colony
text: When you complete this mission, you may download a copy of a personnel you command.

name: Athos IV Maquis Base
skills: You may play [Maq] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {For the Cause}.

name: Avert Danger
text: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Physics or 2 Science, score 5 points.

name: Brute Force
text: When you complete this mission, if each of your personnel at this mission is a [Kli] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Cargo Haul
text: You cannot move your ship from this mission to a headquarters mission. When you move your ship with your Acquisition personnel aboard it to this mission, if you have not completed this mission, you may stop that personnel draw a card.

name: Investigate Maquis Activity
text: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet. When you complete this mission, if you have completed no other missions, score 5 points.

name: McAllister C-5 Nebula Mine Nebula
text: When you complete this mission, if you command three [Baj] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Treat Plague Ship
text: When you complete this mission, place one of your Medical personnel at this mission in your discard pile.

name: Kitara
text: When an opponent beams to or from this mission, if it is a planet mission and this ship is staffed, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Aldara
text: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, each of your Cardassians aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Guingouin
text: When you win an engagement you began involving this ship, if each ship you command is a [Maq] ship, score 10 points.

name: Maquis Raider
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser places one of his or her personnel involved on top of that personnel's owner's deck.

name: Valjean
text: Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qam-Chee
text: While this ship is at an opponent's mission, if this ship is staffed, each of your opponent's personnel and ships at this mission is attributes -1.

name: Fortune
text: When you play this ship, you may download a [NA] Archaeology personnel.

name: Tama
text: While this ship is at a planet mission, if this ship is staffed, an opponent must discard a card from hand to beam to or from this planet.

name: Khazara
text: Order - If this ship is on your {Engage Cloak}, examine an opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. That opponent exchanges that card with the top card of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Terix
text: While this ship is at an opponent's space mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.

name: Trolarak
text: While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.

name: A Bad End
text: Randomly select one of your stopped personnel on this planet to be killed.

name: An Old Debt
text: Unless you have Biology, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Intelligence and 2 Medical, randomly select a Leadership personnel to be killed.

name: Close Call
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Security or 2 Programming and Transporters, randomly select an Engineer to be killed.

name: Confined to Quarters
text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Leadership, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Dangerous Climb
text: Unless you have 2 Geology or Strength>40, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Depression
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Medical or Telepathy and Integrity>32, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: DNA Analysis
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Medical or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses a Medical or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Dressing Down
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the cost of any of those personnel is 1, all three are stopped.

name: Failure To Communicate
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Security, your opponent chooses a Anthropology or Security personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Forsaken
text: Unless you have 2 Honor or 2 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. Each Honor or Treachery personnel that uses his or her skills while facing this dilemma is placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Gomtuu Shock Wave
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

name: Graviton Wave
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Biology and 2 Medical, randomly select a Science personnel to be killed.

name: History Repeats Itself
text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Anthropology, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Inside Collaborators
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Treachery, your opponent chooses a Diplomacy or Treachery personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Justice or Vengeance
text: Unless you have Anthropology and 2 Security or Exobiology, Honor, and Integrity>32, randomly select a Treachery personnel to be killed.

name: Miner Disagreement
text: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Cunning>32 or 2 Exobiology and Leadership, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Murder Investigation
text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Security, all three are stopped.

name: Overwhelmed
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Psychic Receptacle
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel who has that skill. While a personnel who has that same card title is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use his or her skills. This effect lasts until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Psycho-Kinetic Attack
text: Unless you have Exobiology and 2 Medical or Honor and Telepathy, randomly select a Security personnel to be killed.

name: Quantum Filament
text: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Engineer, Science, and Shields>8, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - When your personnel aboard this ship are about to face a dilemma, randomly select one of them to be stopped.

name: Restricted Area
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: "Rock People"
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Integrity>30 or Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Rogue Borg Ambush
text: Unless you have Intelligence and Cunning>35 or a Hand Weapon and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Secret Identity
text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your deck. Place the personnel your opponent chose in his or her owner's discard pile. Shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Sheer Lunacy
text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Cunning>32 or 2 Programming and Science, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Skeleton Crew
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. To begin a mission attempt at this mission, you must have at least six personnel involved. When you complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

name: So Many Enemies
text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Treachery, all three are stopped.

name: Sokath, His Eyes Uncovered!
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Cunning>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Demands of Duty
text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. Unless you choose to have all your personnel be stopped, that personnel is killed.

name: A Second Chance at Life
text: Reveal your hand. Choose an opponent to choose a card from your hand. Discard it to take any other non-interrupt card from your discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

name: Abduction
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your two [Bor] Security personnel present together at a non-Headquarters mission to name a skill. Randomly select an opponent's personnel present who has that skill and take command of him or her.

name: Adding to Our Perfection
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Bor] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel and take command of him or her.

name: Borg Cutting Beam
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Bor] ship. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, place him or her on that [Bor] ship, then place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Bred for Battle
text: Plays in your core. Order - Discard two cards from hand to begin combat involving your Jem'Hadar. Your non-Jem'Hadar present are not involved in the combat. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Building a Bridge
text: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, for each Vorta that used any of his or her skills to complete that mission, each opponent discards a card from hand and you may draw a card.

name: Cavalry Raid
text: Plays in your core. When an engagement in which an opponent's personnel was killed ends, you may destroy this event to unstop each of your [Kli] personnel and [Kli] ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: Changeling Sabotage
text: Plays in your core. Order - If your Infiltrator is aboard an opponent's undamaged ship, return that Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to place a Damage card from hand aboard that ship.

name: Dispensing the White
text: To play this event, you must command a Treachery Vorta. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Dissolving the Senate
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to make one of your unique personnel present attributes +4. This effect last until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Enemy in Your Midst
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to place any number of your Infiltrators at one mission aboard a ship at the same mission.

name: One With the Borg
text: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to score 5 points for each personnel you command but do not own.

name: Psychological Pressure
text: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is facing a dilemma, if he or she has the same skills as any of your captives, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that skill.

name: Quite a Coincidence
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. When an opponent's personnel who has that card title is killed, destroy this event to score 10 points.

name: Regeneration Alcoves
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Bor] personnel at your Unicomplex, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that personnel on your [Bor] ship instead.

name: Sabotage Program
text: To play this event, you must command three [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When an event is played, you must destroy this event to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Sensing a Trap
text: To play this event, you must command a [Rom] Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 10 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn.

name: Set Up
text: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is about to be randomly selected, if your Infiltrator is at that mission, you may destroy this event to instead choose the opponent's personnel to be selected from all eligible possibilities.

name: Severed Link
text: To play this event, you must command a [Bor] Programming personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Sluggo
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. That personnel cannot use his or her skills to meet mission requirements.

name: Steeled By Loss
text: Replace a [Baj] personnel you command with a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile that has at least one of the same skills. Place the personnel you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile. Remove this event from the game.

name: Stir Crazy
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, if he or she has already completed a mission of the same type, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: The Blight
text: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event. Starting with the player to your left, each player may choose an event to be destroyed.

name: The Crystalline Entity
text: Plays in your core. Order - If you command another event, give command of this event to the player on your right to destroy an event (move this event to his or her core).

name: The Enterprise Incident
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Rom] ship. Each of your ships at the same mission that has your [Rom] Intelligence personnel aboard it may join the engagement. If you win, randomly select an opponent's Leadership personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: The Manheim Effect
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may destroy this event to take an overcome dilemma you own from an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of your dilemma pile.

name: The Trial Never Ended
text: Plays in your core. When a dilemma is about to be overcome, you may destroy this event to exchange that dilemma with the top card of its owner's dilemma pile. (The new dilemma is overcome.)

name: The Will of the Collective
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Bor] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, and place him or her on your [Bor] ship at this mission.

name: Trial of Faith
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Plays in your core. An opponent may play a card he or she owns that is on this event as if that card were in his or her hand. If he or she does, score 5 points. Order - Examine an opponent's discard pile. Place one of those cards on this event. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Under Suspicion
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, for each of your Infiltrators at that mission, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Vorta Cloning
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to place a Vorta in your discard pile, you may reveal a card from hand and remove it from the game to take that Vorta into hand instead.

name: Adapt
text: When your [Bor] personnel is facing a dilemma, if a copy of that dilemma is overcome at a mission you command, prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Analyze
text: When an opponent's dilemma that your [Bor] personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile, overcome that dilemma instead.

name: Cultist Attack
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Baj] Treachery personnel. Order - Each player removes all interrupts in his or her discard pile from the game.

name: Founder Trap
text: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, discard a random card from hand to add the skills of your Infiltrator at that mission to the mission's requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent's turn. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Insult
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck. If it is not a personnel, discard the top two cards of your deck. If it is a personnel who costs 1, you may place this interrupt on top of your deck instead of discarding it.

name: Our Death is Glory To the Founders
text: When an event or interrupt is played, kill one of your Jem'Hadar to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Parting Shot
text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an opponent's personnel uses his or her skills, if he or she is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to kill that personnel.

name: Pseudopod
text: Order - Return your Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Infiltrator.

name: Security Sweep
text: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Rom] Security personnel. Order - Reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck. If they are all personnel, score 10 points. Place them in the same order on the bottom of that opponent's deck.

name: The Founder is Wise
text: When your Vorta is facing a dilemma, he or she is attributes +2 and gains all skills on one of your Founders present. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: You Could Be Invaluable
text: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Fed][Maq] personnel. Order - Reveal the top four cards of your deck and take a non-[Maq] personnel revealed into hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Archanis Dispute
skills: Leadership, Cunning>30, and (Diplomacy and Law or Intelligence and Treachery)

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Battle Reconnaissance
skills: Exobiology, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Strength>32

name: Camping Trip
skills: Biology, Geology, Science, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Honor)
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34.

name: Vandros IV Destroy Iconian Gateway
skills: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Security, and Strength>34

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Destroy Transwarp Hub
skills: 2 Engineer, Exobiology, Navigation, Physics, Programming, Security, and Cunning>48
text: You may attempt and complete this mission for 35 points using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Programming, 2 Security, and Cunning>34.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Evade Borg Vessel
skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>36
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Evade Dominion Squadron
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Leadership, 2 Navigation, and Cunning>34.

name: Expose Changeling Influence
skills: Anthropology, Engineer, Honor, 2 Security, and Integrity>36
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>40.

name: Extract Defector
skills: Intelligence, 2 Navigation, and (Security and Strength>34 or Transporters and Cunning>32)
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Car] or [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Harness Omega Particle
skills: Engineer, Geology, Medical, 2 Physics, Programming, Science, and Cunning>48
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Medical, Officer, Physics, Science, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>48.

name: Hunt Alien
skills: 2 Exobiology, Navigation, Strength>32, and (Leadership or Security)

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Instruct Advanced Drone
skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, Programming, and Integrity>35
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>40.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Terok Nor
skills: You may play [TN] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Pacify Warring Factions
text: When your personnel attempting this mission is killed by a dilemma, you may return that personnel to his or her owner's hand instead.

name: Peaceful Contact
skills: Diplomacy, Honor, Leadership, Navigation, and Integrity>31
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirments: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, Transporters, and Strength>34.

name: Plot Invasion
skills: Transporters, Cunning>30, and (Leadership and Officer or 2 Security)
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, and Strength>30.

name: Farius Prime Political Intrigue
skills: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] or [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, 2 Intelligence, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Rescue Prisoners of War
skills: Intelligence, Navigation, Programming, Transporters, and Cunning>32
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Exobiology, Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>32.

name: Restock Ketracel-White
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] or [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>36.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Salvage Borg Ship
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Medical, Programming, and Cunning>34

name: Torga IV Salvage Dominion Ship
skills: Diplomacy, Engineer, Leadership, Programming, and Strength>34
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: 2 Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, and Cunning>34.

name: Signal for Rescue
skills: Biology, Engineer, Programming, Security, Strength>42, and (Diplomacy and Treachery or Honor and Leadership)

name: Stage Bombardment
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, 2 Leadership, Treachery, and Cunning>32.

name: Study Rare Phenomenon
skills: Engineer, Navigation, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Strength>34.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Survey Star System
text: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have Acquisition, Diplomacy, or Treachery, score 5 points.

name: The Siege of AR-558
skills: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Programming, Security, and Strength>38
