name: Drake Voyager Shuttle
text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you command six or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -2. While you command a Temporal event in your core, this ship is Range +3.

name: Chameloid Chicanery
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent has an Infiltrator at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Vosk Temporal Fanatic
skills: Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Leadership Officer 2 Treachery
text: For each Temporal event in your core, this personnel is attributes +1 (limit +4). When you do not command a Temporal event, place this personnel in his owner's discard pile.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship
text: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Thermokinetic Explosion
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, and Cunning>30 or total ship's attributes>21, place this dilemma on your ship and all your personnel are stopped. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, choose an opponent. That opponent may download a Damage card and place it on this ship.

name: New Discovery
text: Plays in your core. When your ship moves from a mission where an opponent has a ship, you may examine the top two dilemmas of that opponent's dilemma pile and replace them in any order.

name: Preventative Ritual
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Reveal the top four cards of an opponent's deck and place one of those cards on the bottom of that deck. Replace the remaining cards in any order on top of that deck.

name: Stadi Focused
text: When you play this personnel, you may make your [Voy] ship Range +2 until the end of the turn.

name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport
text: While you command eight or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters mission and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. Order - Discard two events from hand to make this ship Range +2 until the end of this turn.

name: Confessions of a Captain
text: Plays in your core. While your [Fed][Voy] Leadership personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill from a [Fed][Voy] personnel present until the end of this turn.

name: Compassionate Interference
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal a Biology personnel from your hand or reveal a Geology personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Hull Breach
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal an Astrometrics personnel from your hand or reveal a Navigation personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Last Gasp
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal a Leadership personnel from your hand or reveal an Officer personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Parallel Course
text: Plays in your core. When your opponent moves from a mission where you have a staffed ship, you may take a dilemma from beneath that mission and return it to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Basso Tromac Smug Subordinate
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove a card in your discard pile from the game to add its cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of the mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Grebnedlog Pakled Captain
text: While present with a non-[NA] personnel, this personnel loses Honor and gains Transporters and Treachery.

name: Lal Beloved
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make her attributes +4 and gain any two skills until the end of the turn. If you do this, she is killed at the end of this turn. You may only do this once each turn.

name: D'Tan Curious Youth
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, you may stop this personnel to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Engineer. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Trager Patrol Ship
text: When this ship is about to move from an opponent's mission, subtract 2 from the Range required.

name: Krayton Trade Envoy
text: Order - If this ship has its Commander aboard it, discard a Rule card from your hand to add the discarded card's cost to the Range of this ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Baxial Salvage Ship
text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you have six or more events in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +3.

name: Armed Search Party
text: Randomly select three personnel. Unless they have Strength>17 or you have a non-Hand Weapon equipment, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select one of those personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Difficult Rescue
text: Unless you have Shields + remaining Range>the number of personnel attempting this mission, randomly select a personnel to be killed and all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Psionic Attack
text: Unless you have Medical and Science or 3 Security, randomly select a personnel to place on the bottom of his or her owner's deck. If that personnel has Anthropology, randomly select an additional personnel and place that personnel on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Sabotaged Reactor
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Navigation or Leadership, Officer, and Cunning>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is Range -2.

name: Joint Operation Drills
text: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a person who has that skill to be stopped.

name: Stand-Off
text: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Law, Security, and Strength>28, randomly select a Leadership personnel, place him or her in your opponent's brig, and all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Symbalene Blood Burn
text: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, and Medical or Officer, Security, and Strength>28, randomly select four personnel to be stopped and place this dilemma on your ship at this mission. Damage - At the start of each turn, randomly select a personnel on this ship to be killed.

name: Temporal Conduit
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Leadership or Programming, Science, and Transporters, your opponent places this dilemma on one of your completed missions. At the end of each of your turns, your opponent may place a dilemma from beneath one of your other missions beneath this mission.

name: Under Pressure
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Navigation or Biology, Medical, and Science, randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may randomly select two personnel to be stopped to prevent this.

name: Federation Compression Rifle
text: While in combat, each of your [Voy] personnel present is Strength +1. While facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, each [Voy] Security personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Dark Pursuit
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When the player on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt, you may draw one extra dilemma for each Pursuit card you command.

name: Political Putsch
text: To play this event, you must command two Treachery [Baj] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, remove all events in each player's discard pile from the game. When an event is played, prevent that event and remove it from the game unless that event's owner has an event in his or her discard pile.

name: Rule of Acquisition #16
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may destroy this event to spend an additional counter this turn for each card on this event. Order - Stop your [Fer] personnel to place a card from hand on this event.

name: Modified Tricorder
text: When your personnel present are facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand to make each [Voy] Biology and each [Voy] Science personnel present attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Make a Run for It
text: Plays in your core. If your opponent moves from a mission where you have a ship that has its Commander aboard, place this event on that ship. When your opponent's personnel attempt this mission, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra on dilemmas.

name: Starting Over
text: Count the number of cards in your hand and discard your hand to draw an equal number of cards. Then, if you command a Borg personnel, draw two additional cards. Destroy this event.

name: The Spirit of Kahless
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Honor personnel. If you win, the opponent on your left places the top two dilemmas of his or her dilemma pile beneath one of your non-headquarters missions.

name: And Raise You
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Voy] personnel. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, make an opponent reveal the top three cards of his or her dilemma pile. Then replace those dilemmas in the same order. You may then make that opponent shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Fajo's Menagerie
text: Order - Download an equipment card, then draw a card for each non-Hand Weapon equipment you command.

name: Kira Nerys Blockade Commander
text: While this personnel is aboard your {Kitara}, that ship is attributes +2.

name: Zayra Bigoted Witness
text: While this personnel is present with your non-[Baj] personnel, he cannot use his skills.

name: Baxter Wandering Security Officer
text: When this personnel is placed in his owner's discard pile from play, you may take an event from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Joe Carey Next In Line
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if there are three or less dilemmas beneath that mission, he is attributes +1.

name: Macet Skeptical Commander
text: While this personnel is aboard your {Trager} and this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Treachery instead.

name: Umat'Adan Eager Fifth
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, return your non-Alpha Jem'Hadar present to its owner's hand to make this personnel attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Andreas Colter
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each of your Security personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Cavit Apprehensive First Officer
text: While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, you may make him attributes +3 until the end of the turn. If you do this and fail this mission attempt, kill this personnel. Otherwise he is stopped. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kenneth Dalby Insubordinate Crewman
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may examine the top card of an opponent's deck. You may choose to place that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Kosinski Arrogant Engineer
skills: Astrometrics Engineer Navigation Physics Programming Science Transporters
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he is Cunning -2 and loses Astrometrics and Navigation.

name: Larson Security Team Member
skills: Archaeology Geology Physics Science Security Transporters
text: When your [Voy] personnel present is stopped, stop this personnel.

name: Lyndsay Ballard Back From the Dead
skills: Astrometrics Honor Navigation Physics Programming Science
text: While this personnel is facing the last dilemma on your opponent's dilemma stack, you may kill her to make each [Voy] personnel present attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Marie Kaplan Observant Officer
text: While this personnel is at a [DQ] mission, she gains Biology and Medical.

name: Marquay
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if there are three or more dilemmas overcome beneath that mission, he gains Security and Treachery.

name: Rachel Garrett Displaced Captain
skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Leadership Navigation Officer Transporters
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, randomly return one of your personnel present to his or her owner's hand.

name: Samantha Wildman First Mother on Voyager
text: When you play this personnel, you may return a non-dilemma card on your Decay event to its owner's hand.

name: Seska Cardassian Agent
text: When this personnel uses a skill, your [Fed] Leadership personnel and your [Fed] Officer personnel are attributes -1 until the end of the turn.

name: Tom Paris Best Pilot You Could Have
text: While this personnel is aboard a [Voy] ship, that ship is Range +2.

name: Tuvok Chief of Security
skills: Anthropology Biology Honor Law Leadership Officer Security
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Officer or Security at a [DQ] mission, he is attributes +2 and gains Security.

name: Quark Little Green Man
text: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, he is attributes +1 and gains Acquisition, Diplomacy, and Treachery.

name: Rata Profiteer
text: When you play this personnel, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an event, you may draw two cards.

name: Tog Lecherous DaiMon
text: While you have four or more cards beneath your {Ferenginar}, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Treachery.

name: Worf The Strongest Heart
text: When your Host or Honor Klingon present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Jadzia Dax The Second Heart
text: Order - Stop your Honor Klingon present and destroy an event in your core to take an event from your discard pile into hand.

name: K'Temoc Long Slumbering Commander
text: When this personnel is involved in combat and you command more Assault events than each opponent, you may kill this personnel to unstop each of your Klingon personnel present at the end of that combat.

name: Kes Curious Ocampa
text: While you command a completed planet mission, place this personnel in her owner's discard pile.

name: Neelix Morale Officer
text: While facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, this personnel gains Acquisition and Honor.

name: Shran Reluctant Diplomat
text: When one of your non-Andorian personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Tam Elbrun Prodigal Telepath
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may reveal a random card from an opponent's hand for each completed mission you command. Choose one of those cards to be placed on the bottom of that opponent's deck.

name: Thon
text: Order - If you do not command a completed space mission, discard a random card from your hand to place your ship this personnel is aboard at your incomplete space mission. You may do this once each turn.

name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor
text: When an opponent plays an event, you may discard a Romulan from hand to download an event. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Cochrane Voyager Shuttle
text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you command six or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -2. This ship is attributes +1 for each Navigation personnel aboard.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise
text: When you complete a [Kli] mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation
text: When you play this ship, for each [TNG] Leadership personnel at this mission, this ship is cost -1. Order - Stop your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel aboard this ship and return your event with no cards on it to its owner's hand to have each opponent return one of his or her events with no cards on it to its owner's hand.

name: I.K.S. T'Ong Sleeper Ship
text: When you win an engagement with this ship and its Commander is aboard it, you may place a [Kli] personnel from hand aboard this ship.

name: Jovis Museum
text: While you have more Artifacts in your core than any opponent, each Treachery personnel aboard this ship is attributes +1.

name: Mondor Far From Home
text: While you have its Commander aboard it, this ship is attributes +1 for each non-[NA] personnel aboard. (limit +4)

name: Destined Journey
text: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Leadership to be stopped. If that personnel has both Honor and Leadership, you may unstop your stopped personnel present and that personnel joins the mission attempt. If you cannot choose a personnel with Honor or Leadership, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Accelerated Aging
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission cannot use his or her first-listed skill. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Final Triumph
text: Unless you choose to discard an event from your hand, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Blow You Out of the Stars
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. That opponent may place one of his or her unique personnel involved in your brig to prevent this and destroy this event. If you do not win, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

keywords: Replicate - Discard an event from your hand.
name: Cellular Peptide Cake
text: To play this event, you must command a Klingon. Each player returns a non-[Ref] event in an opponent's core to its owner's hand. Destroy this event.

name: Khan!
text: When an opponent scores 5 or more points, if he or she has not completed a mission, he or she loses 5 points.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Genesis Planet
skills: Geology, Cunning>42 and (Biology, 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 2 Security, Transporters and 2 Treachery)
text: Order - If this mission is completed, lose 5 points to make this a space mission. Kill all personnel (and destroy all equipment) on this mission.

name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1 and gains Honor.

name: Subterranean Barrier
text: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, Geology and Integrity>25 or Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel your opponent chose on the top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Learning Curve
text: Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if you played two or more [Maq] personnel this turn, place two cards from the top of your deck on this event. You may play cards from this event as though there were in your hand.

name: No-Win Situation
text: Plays in your core. When your dilemma is prevented or its requirements are met, randomly select an opponent's personnel that was facing that dilemma to be stopped.

name: The Genesis Effect
text: Plays on your mission. When you play this event, name a dilemma. When your personnel face that dilemma at this mission, prevent and overcome it.

name: Jasad
text: While this personnel is aboard your [Car] ship, that ship is attributes +1 for each of your different Capture cards and each of your different Punishment cards.

name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker
text: When a dilemma is about to be revealed, if this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove him from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Spock Trainee Instructor
skills: Biology Honor Leadership Officer Physics Science
text: When a Damage card is about to be placed on your ship that this personnel is aboard, you may kill him to remove it from the game instead.

name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to choose one: draw two cards; or take a [Maq] personnel from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Tuvok Undercover
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and you have a [Maq] personnel present, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence.

name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
text: When you win an engagement involving this personnel and there are two or less personnel aboard an opponent's ship involved, you may remove a damage event from that ship to place those personnel in your brig. You now command that ship (it is now a [Kli] ship).

name: David Marcus Young Scientist
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy an event in your core (if you do not, lose 5 points instead).

name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis
text: While present with an opponent's personnel, each of that opponent's personnel is attributes -1.

name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel
text: While this ship is at a [Bor] mission, personnel aboard it are attributes +1. While your Borg Queen is aboard this ship, it is staffed.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior
text: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When this ship is about to move between Earth and another mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Jadzia Dax Soldier of Fortune
text: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, draw cards up to the cost of a personnel present, then place the same number of cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Energize
text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event. The first non-[TNG] personnel you play each turn is cost -2 for each card on this event.

name: Wesley Crusher Battleship Helmsman
skills: Astrometrics Engineer Navigation Officer Physics Programming
text: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, the ship this personnel is aboard is attributes +1 and this personnel gains Geology and Science.

name: Rekar Tool of the Tal'Shiar
skills: Astrometrics Engineer Intelligence Leadership Officer Security
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Intelligence personnel, he is cost -1. When this personnel attempts a non-[Rom] mission and your [Rom] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent can draw.

name: Captain's Log
text: Plays in your core. While facing a dilemma, you may exclude your corresponding Commander aboard his or her ship from random selections.

name: Travis Mayweather Opportunistic Sergeant
text: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, if you have no cards in hand, you may exclude a [SF] personnel present from that selection.

name: Charles Tucker III Competent Engineer
text: While you have no cards in your hand, cards your opponent owns cannot destroy your events.

name: Infestation
text: Your opponent may have more than three copies of this card in his or her dilemma pile. Your personnel can face more than one copy of this dilemma during each mission attempt. Choose a personnel to be stopped.

name: Soval Idealist
text: While you have no cards in hand, this personnel gains Biology, Exobiology, and Geology.

name: Marlena Moreau (Mirror)
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to make each player discard a personnel from hand.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Critical Care
text: When you complete this mission, you may take up to three personnel in your discard pile and place each on the bottom of his or her owner's decks.

name: Beverly Crusher Battleship Doctor
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an [AU][TNG] Officer personnel, she is cost -1. When your [TNG] personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: Unimatrix Zero
text: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When you play this event, for each unique Borg personnel you command, this event is cost -1. Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn. Each unique personnel you command gains [AU].

name: Hoshi Sato Captain's Woman
text: While you have no cards in hand, this personnel and each of your Leadership personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Revised Seven of Nine Shock-Trooper
text: Order - Discard a card titled {Seven of Nine} or Revised Seven of Nine from hand to choose one: place a personnel present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck, or take a Hologram from your discard pile into hand.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Fiendish Physician
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +3 to name a personnel. Each opponent kills each personnel he or she commands with that card title.

name: The Inner Light
text: To play this event, you must command no [Bor] cards. Plays in your core. When you play this event, you may play an [AU] personnel aboard your ship. That personnel loses each of his or her icons (except for [AU] and those in gametext), gains [Stf], and becomes [NA]. When this event is destroyed, kill that personnel.

name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander
skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Officer Security 2 Treachery
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if you have no cards in hand, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Discard a card from hand to download {Watch Dog}.

name: Distraction
text: Choose a number of personnel who have a total cost of 4 or more to be stopped.

name: Erika Benteen Leyton's Adjunct
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to unstop all your stopped [Fed] personnel at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship
text: This ship is attributes +2 for each corresponding Commander aboard it.

name: Phlox Sadistic Physiologist
skills: Biology Engineer 2 Exobiology Medical Science 2 Treachery
text: Order - If you have no cards in hand, each opponent must kill one of his or her non-unique personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Worf Defiant Commander
text: Each of your personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is attributes +1.

name: Dangerous Missions
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel who has a cost of 2 or less cannot use his or her skills while facing dilemmas. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Preventative Repercussions
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 5 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Aftereffects
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 5 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Seasoned Leader
text: To play this event, you must command three [AU][SF] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, you may choose one: draw a card; download a [SF] Leadership personnel; or shuffle two cards from hand into their owner's deck.

name: Deyos Ruthless Administrator
text: When you play this personnel, if you command a Vorta, this personnel is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may meet Integrity and Strength requirements with Cunning instead.

name: Fractured Time
text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are removed from the game.

name: Data From the City of Rateg
text: Order - Name a dilemma. While this personnel is facing that dilemma, he cannot be killed or stopped. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Strange New Worlds
text: Plays on an opponent's mission. Replace this mission's requirements (and alternate requirements in game text) with Anthropology, Diplomacy, Law, and Integrity>32.

name: Call of the Nagus
text: Download three [Fer] personnel. Choose an opponent to select two of those personnel to be placed beneath your Ferenginar (discard them if you do not command Ferenginar). Then place the other personnel in your hand. Destroy this event.

name: Brunt Nice Guy
skills: Archaeology Engineer Honor Medical Navigation Programming Security
text: When you play this personnel, choose one: download an [AU] personnel; or download a [Fer] ship.

name: Nog Bar Owner
text: While you have six or more cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +3. While you command more events than an opponent, if you command {Ferenginar}, that opponent's events cannot destroy your events.

name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship
text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. You do not need to spend all your counters on your turns. While you have no cards in your hand, this ship is Range +2.

name: Maximilian Forrest Confident Captain
skills: Archaeology Biology Law Leadership Navigation Officer Transporters Treachery
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you have no cards in hand, he cannot be placed in an opponent's brig or killed.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes
text: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: Mardel Overseer
skills: Anthropology Engineer Geology Physics Security Treachery
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a personnel from hand to add his or her cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of that dilemma.

name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling
text: When you play this personnel, if you command a Treachery personnel, he is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to make him gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Odo Efficient Overseer
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may kill one of your personnel to make him gain a skill on a personnel in your discard pile who has a cost of 4 or more until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Call to Arms
text: Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving two of your personnel who both have a cost of 4 or more, score 10 points.

name: Brutal Experiments
text: When any number of your [AU] personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed, destroy a non-Hand Weapon equipment present to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Montgomery Scott Uncivilized Engineer
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player destroy an event he or she commands.

name: Crew Advancement
text: Your opponent names an attributes (Integrity, Cunning, or Strength). Your personnel with the highest named attribute is stopped.

name: Farrell
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player download a unique personnel.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Battleship
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may score 5 points.

name: Chula: The Dice
text: Unless you have a personnel with Integrity>6, a second personnel with Cunning>6, and a third personnel with Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rom Professional Soldier
text: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may exchange two cards in hand with an interrupt beneath your {Ferenginar}. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: T'Pol Not a Slave
skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Engineer Leadership Officer Programming Science
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Officer personnel, this personnel is cost -1. While you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Hikaru Sulu Savage Security Chief
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw a card for each of your [TOS] Treachery personnel, then place the same number of cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Brennan Scott
text: This personnel is attributes -1 for each card in your hand.

name: Gint The First Grand Nagus
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Acquisition personnel, he is cost -3. While you command four cards that have a cost of four or more, you may spend an additional counter each turn.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship
text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Revised Paris Female Ensign Chaser
text: Order - Discard a card titled {Tom Paris} or Revised Paris from hand to make each of your [Fut][Voy] Holograms gain [Cmd] until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Paranoid Escape
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel to be removed from the game. You cannot play cards that have the same title as that personnel. When you complete this mission, put the personnel removed from the game in his or her owner's hand and this dilemma is overcome.

name: Tuvok Coldly Logical Soldier
text: When you download a card, if you command an [AU] personnel and you have not downloaded a card titled Tuvok this turn, you may also download this personnel. (This ability may be used while this personnel is in your deck.)

name: Lwaxana Troi Extravagant Ambassador
text: When you play this personnel, if you command three [Fed] personnel, she is cost -5.

name: Interphasic Effects
text: Unless you have an [AU] personnel, randomly select a personnel to be killed and your opponent may choose an event to destroy.

name: Pran Thot
skills: Engineer Leadership Medical Navigation Officer Physics
text: When you play this personnel, each player discards any number of cards from hand that have a total cost of 4 or more. If a player cannot, he or she discards his or her entire hand.

name: These Are The Voyages
text: Draw a number of cards equal to the cost of one of your personnel, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Slar Gorn Slave Master
text: This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each [AU] personnel present.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Investigate Derelict
skills: Engineer, Exobiology, Navigation, Security, and Cunning>35
text: When you complete this mission, if an opponent has had more turns than you have, restore all Range of your ship at this mission used this turn.

name: Revised Janeway Cold-Blooded Killer
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Kathryn Janeway} or Revised Janeway from hand to make her Cunning +5 and Strength +5 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Sabotaged Transporter
text: Plays in your core. When a personnel is stopped by a dilemma you own, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to kill that personnel.

name: Bigger Tattoo
text: Plays in your core. When you draw dilemmas, if your opponent's personnel is attempting a space mission, you may remove a planet dilemma you have drawn from the game to draw two additional dilemmas. When you draw dilemmas, if your opponent's personnel is attempting a planet mission, you may remove a space dilemma you have drawn from the game to draw two additional dilemmas.

name: Predicament
text: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Spock Man of Integrity
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to have him gain any skill of your choice and make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor
text: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Rom] personnel. When you move this ship from an opponent's mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, that opponent must discard two cards from hand (limit two cards per turn).

name: D-7 Battlecruiser
text: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Kli] personnel.

name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel
text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: T'Auethn Obedient Centurion
text: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each event revealed, this personnel is cost -1. Then you may choose a non-ship card revealed and remove it from the game. Order - Kill this personnel to discard a card from hand.

name: Gem
text: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may remove her from the game to name a dilemma and choose an opponent to remove a copy of that dilemma in his or her dilemma pile from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile.

name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Cunning +2.

name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet
text: While you have no cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +4, Strength +4, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. Order - Examine and remove two cards in a player's discard pile from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Mara Science Officer
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. When you play a [Pa][Kli] personnel, you may discard a [Pa] card from hand to download an interrupt.

name: Korax Instigator
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -1. This personnel is Strength +1 for each [Pa][Kli] personnel present.

name: Kang Vigilant Commander
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Integrity +2.

name: Orfil Quinteros
text: When you play this personnel, each player chooses one: download a non-unique ship; draw two cards; shuffle his or her deck; or shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Julian Bashir Medical Staffer
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. At the start of each of your turns, you may take a personnel in your discard pile and place that personnel on the bottom of your deck. When you do this, each opponent may do the same with his or her discard pile and deck.

name: Gary Mitchell Godlike Mutant
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to make him attributes +5 and gain Telepathy and Treachery until the end of this turn.

name: Chakotay First Officer
text: When you play this personnel, you may discard two cards from hand to download two [Voy] Treachery personnel and place each where he or she could be played.

name: Carolyn Palamas
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is odd, you may subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw this turn. Otherwise, add one to the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw this turn.

name: Bejal Otner Wormhole Theorist
text: You may play this personnel at {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [GQ] mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Areel Shaw
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of [TOS] personnel you command who have Honor or Officer. Take one of those cards into hand and shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Lovok Founder Effective Changeling
text: While this personnel is not present with your personnel, an opponent cannot take command of, capture, or kill him.

name: Krajensky Founder Adversary
text: When personnel the opponent on your right commands attempts this mission, if this mission has two or more dilemmas overcome beneath it, you may draw two extra dilemmas and spend two extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Oran Irritable Gul
text: When you play this personnel, this personnel and a unique personnel present gain any one skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Two of Nine Transtator Drone
text: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to choose one: destroy an event; download a card that has a cost of 5 or more; or draw three cards.

name: Four of Nine Heuristics Drone
text: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to download two unique [Bor] personnel.

name: Mullibok Gnarled and Battered Old Tree
text: When you have ten or more cards in your discard pile, this personnel cannot be killed or stopped by dilemmas.

name: You Have a Disease
text: Plays in your core. When your unique [Bor] personnel uses a skill to meet a requirement on a dilemma or mission, you may choose an opponent to discard a card from hand. Then you may draw a card for each headquarters mission that opponent commands. You may do this only once each turn.

name: The Circle
text: To play this event, you must command {Bajor} and no other headquarters missions. Plays in your core. While an opponent has seven or more personnel in his or her discard pile, you may spend 2 additional counters during your turn.

name: Rule of Acquisition #18
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may destroy this event to spend four additional counters this turn.

name: Obstacle to Opportunity
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play an Acquisition personnel, you may discard a card from hand to choose an opponent and examine the top card of his or her dilemma pile. Place that dilemma on the top or bottom of that dilemma pile.

name: Silent Attack
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are stopped and this dilemma is placed in your core. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped. When you play a non-unique personnel, he or she is cost +1.

name: Evans
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to download {Final Cry} or a [TOS] Security personnel.

name: Josephs
text: You may play this personnel at cost +5 to make each player discard five cards from the top of his or her deck for each headquarters mission he or she commands.

name: Ambassador Gral High-Ranking Official
text: While an opponent has completed more turns that you have, this personnel is attributes +2.

name: Trelane's Trial
text: Choose a personnel that does not have an attributes>6 to be stopped. If you cannot, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Bashir Founder Imperturbable Infiltrator
text: While you command two Founders, you may play this personnel at cost +2 aboard an opponent's ship. If you do this, that opponent now commands him. While you command but do not own this personnel, each of your personnel is attributes -1 (even if this personnel is stopped).

name: Pavel A. Chekov Young Navigator
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to return a [TOS] personnel you command to his or her owner's hand.

name: Janice Rand Captain's Yeoman
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to name a unique [TOS] personnel. That personnel cannot be stopped or killed by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: James T. Kirk Youngest Captain in Starfleet
Plasma Energy Weapon
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may make each opponent draw five cards. At the end of each of your turns, each opponent that drew cards this turn this way places five cards from hand on the bottom of his or her deck in any order.

name: Tal Alert Subcommander
text: When you play a [Rom] personnel at this mission, reveal an opponent's hand. If you reveal an interrupt this way, you may download a card that has the same cost as that personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Robert Tomlinson
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to shuffle your deck or shuffle your dilemma pile.

name: Barrier's Effect
text: Choose a unique personnel to be attributes +3 until the end of this mission attempt. At the end of this mission attempt, place that personnel and an event in your core in their owner's discard piles.

name: Mark Piper
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to take a [TOS] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Mathews
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to take the bottom card of your deck into hand.

name: Vian Test
text: Choose a personnel to place in your opponent's brig. If that personnel is non-unique, your opponent draws up to three cards.

name: Casualties
text: The personnel who has the fewest [SD] icons is stopped. If that personnel does not have at least four [SD] icons, he or she is killed instead.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart
text: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Vault of Tomorrow
text: Your opponent searches his or her dilemma pile and chooses a dilemma that has a cost of 2 or less to place on top of his or her dilemma stack. Then your opponent shuffles his or her dilemma pile and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Tox Uthat
text: While your personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may place this equipment on the bottom of your deck to end your mission attempt. That dilemma and all remaining dilemmas in the dilemma stack are returned to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst
text: Order - Examine the top two cards of your deck. Replace those cards in any order. Order - Exchange a card in hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Christine Chapel Medical Assistant
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to take a [TOS] personnel from your discard pile into hand.

name: Palmer
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to examine and remove two cards in an opponent's discard pile from the game.

name: Uhura Skilled Technician
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to choose one: download an interrupt; or take an interrupt from your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Cascade Virus
text: To play this interrupt you must command {Athos IV} and three [Maq] personnel. When an opponent is about to play a non-unique personnel or a personnel who costs 2 or less, prevent that and place the personnel in its owner's discard pile.

name: Gav Diplomat
skills: Anthropology Archaeology Diplomacy Geology Science Transporters
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may choose an opponent to score 5 points to have this personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Hideaki Chang Conscientious Corporal
text: While this personnel is present with three MACOs, he and each [SF] personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Jeremiah Hayes Diligent Major
text: While your MACO is facing a dilemma at a planet mission and you command a completed space mission, you may place this personnel on that planet mission and have him join that attempt. You may use this ability only if this personnel is at another mission.

name: Khod Conniving Captain
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While this personnel is facing a space dilemma, you may exclude him from any random selections.

name: Kras Merciless Officer
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While this personnel is facing a planet dilemma, you may exclude him from any random selections.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady
text: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +4 to score 5 points.

name: Neural Transceiver
text: When one of your unique [Bor] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from the top of your deck to give him or her a skill that one of your personnel has until the end of the turn.

name: Montgomery Scott Chief Engineer
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order and draw an equal number of cards.

name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander
text: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is cost -1. When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose one: exclude her from that selection; or exclude a [Pa][Rom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Three of Nine Tactician Drone
text: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of her owner's deck and discard four cards from the top of your deck to take up to four cards from your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Benjamin Sisko Command Staffer
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Amanda Cole
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your [SF] Engineer and MACO are present with her, she is attributes +2 and gains Engineer and Programming.

name: Excalbian Drama
text: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard any number of cards from hand. For each card discarded this way, add 5 Integrity to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Integrity>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Driven
text: When your [TOS] Officer is facing a dilemma, discard a [TOS] Officer from hand to choose one: he or she is attributes +5 until the end of that dilemma; or he or she gains a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Earth Lush and Beautiful Home
skills: You may play [TOS] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When you play a [TOS] card here, you may spend a counter to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Navigate Argolis Cluster
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirments: Officer, Leadership, Security and Strength>36.

name: Kira Nerys Bit of a Fighter
text: While you have ten or more cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +1 and gains Diplomacy, Leadership, and Officer.

name: Angela Martine
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to examine the top three cards of your deck or examine the top three cards of your dilemma pile. Replace those cards in the same order.

name: Hikaru Sulu Senior Helmsman
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to examine the top two cards of your deck and the bottom two cards of your deck. Then place those cards on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Marlena Moreau
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to make each player count the number of cards in his or her discard pile, shuffle those cards into his or her deck, and discard from the top of his or her deck an equal number of cards.

name: Matt Decker Vengeful Commodore
text: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to destroy an event.

name: Richard Daystrom Influential Scientist
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to prevent and overcome the first [D] dilemma he faces this turn.

name: Qol Lascivious Lackey
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may reveal an opponent's hand. If he or she reveals no events, you may take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into your hand. Otherwise, that opponent draws a card.

name: U.S.S. Constitution
text: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +3 to draw four cards.

name: Kumari A Fine Ship
text: When you play this ship, you may download a Pursuit card. Order - Discard an event from hand to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of the turn.

name: Hurried Departure
text: Plays in your core. When your ship is about to move from a mission that has a span of 4 or more, subtract 3 from the span total required. When you complete a Nebula mission, you may destroy this event to score 10 points.

name: Jadzia Dax Communications Staffer
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. While this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, she is attributes +1 and gains Anthropology.

name: Nelson Kemper
text: This personnel is attributes +1 for each MACO present.

name: S'Salk Gorn Captain
text: While attempting a mission, this personnel is attributes +1 for each dilemma overcome beneath this mission.

name: Covert Relationship
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. When an opponent's personnel is about to attempt a mission, examine that personnel, each equipment and each personnel present with that personnel.

name: Four of Twelve Standardization Drone
text: When you discard the top card of your deck, if it is a non-Artifact equipment card, you may stop this personnel to place that card on your headquarters mission. Order - Destroy one of your equipment present to make this personnel attributes +2 until the end of this turn.

name: Wolf 359 Assimilate Resistance
skills: Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>42 or Security, Transporters, and Strength>40
text: When you complete this mission, you may choose an opponent and place a personnel from his or her discard pile aboard your ship at this mission. You now command that personnel.

name: Condition Red
text: Plays in your core. Each of your [Stf] personnel loses [Stf] and gains [Cmd]. At the start of each of your turns, if an opponent commands more ships than you, you may discard a card from hand to download a non-unique ship.

name: Lawgivers
text: For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. Each [NA] personnel stopped this way is returned to his or her owner's hand.

name: Gorgan
text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand. Unless you discard a card from hand that has an equal or greater cost than that card, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Gangster's Welcome
text: Unless you have Law and 2 Leadership or 2 Officer and 2 Security, randomly select a personnel to be killed and your opponent may destroy up to two events in your core.

name: Dominion Hierarchy
text: When your Vorta is facing a dilemma, if he or she is present with a Changeling and a Jem'Hadar, he or she is attributes +2 and gains a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man
text: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your unique ship that he is aboard.

name: Skalaar Bounty Hunter
skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Engineer Honor Navigation Security
text: Order - If this personnel is at an opponent's mission, discard four cards from hand to place a captive you command aboard your ship here. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Miles O'Brien Engineering Staffer
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard an equipment from hand to make a [Pa] personnel present attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma.

skills: Anthropology, 2 Leadership, Security, and (Cunning>32 or Strength>32)
text: Each of your [Pa] personnel at this mission is attributes +1.

name: Krax Arrogant Heir

name: Optimism

name: Grav-Plating Trap
text: When an event or interrupt is played, destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to destroy an event.

name: George Stocker Starbase Commodore
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to download a [TOS] ship.

name: U.S.S. Constellation Dead Hulk

name: Sascha Money
text: While present with two MACOs, this personnel cannot be killed by dilemmas.

name: Mugato

name: Ro'suv
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -1.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer

name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain
text: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to download two cards. Those cards must be [TOS], Assault, Maneuver, Pursuit, or Temporal cards.

name: B'Elanna Torres Chief Engineer
text: Order - Discard an equipment, event, or ship from hand to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Not Easily Avoided
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may discard two cards (or an equipment) from hand to search your dilemma pile, choose a dilemma, and place it aside. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile and place that dilemma on top of your dilemma pile.

name: Neural Parasites
text: This dilemma is cost +3 for each mission you have completed. For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent chooses a personnel to be killed.

name: Distress Call
text: This dilemma is cost -3 for each mission you have completed. All your personnel are stopped.

name: Arena
text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has total attributes>18, your opponent places him or her on a planet mission.

name: Keras Creature of Duty

name: Fesarius Bluff
text: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard any number of cards from hand. For each card discarded this way, add 5 Cunning to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Discovered
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Search an opponent's deck and place up to two of those cards in that opponent's discard pile. Those cards cannot be personnel or ships. Then that opponent shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: No Kill I
text: All your personnel are stopped.

name: Moment of Doubt
text: This dilemma is cost -2 for each headquarters mission you command. Your opponent chooses an Officer or Security personnel to be stopped.

name: Final Cry
text: Plays in your core. When your [TOS] personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard three [TOS] cards from hand to stop him or her instead.

name: Mark of Gideon
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, return that personnel to his or her owner's hand, then your opponent chooses a second personnel to return to his or her owner's hand. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: Psychokinetic Control
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission loses each skill he or she has gained. Each personnel cannot gain skills. Each personnel cannot increase his or her attributes. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Tykk

name: Kira Nerys Resourceful Prisoner
skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Intelligence Law Leadership Transporters 2 Treachery
text: At the start of each of your turns, if this personnel is in your discard pile or an opponent's brig, you may remove an [AU] personnel in your discard pile from the game to place this personnel on a headquarters mission where she could be played.

name: Kor Courageous Governor
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Strength +1.

name: Logan Black
text: When you play this personnel you may discard a card from hand to choose one: download a Maneuver card or download an [AU][SF] ship.

name: Stripped Down *AP
text: Your opponent moves up to two dilemmas from beneath this mission to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Neras Slave Girl *AP
text: When you play this personnel, you may draw two cards.

name: Disarming Dream
text: Your opponent names a species. Randomly select a personnel of that species to be stopped.

name: Watch Dog
text: To play this event, you must command three [AU][SF] personnel. Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may play interrupts on this event as if they were in hand. Order - Place an interrupt from hand on this event.

name: Standard Punishment
text: When your personnel is attempting a mission, make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Six of Ten Invalidation Drone

name: Gor Thot
text: When you play this personnel, name 1, 2 or 3. Until the start of your next turn, each player cannot play cards that have a cost equal to the named number.

name: Keiko O'Brien Botanist

name: Revised Chakotay Imposturous First Officer
text: When one of your personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Chakotay} or Revised Chakotay from hand to prevent that.

text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Honor personnel, she is cost -1. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, the cost of the personnel in your discard pile that has the highest cost is added to her attributes.

name: Malcolm Reed Enthusiastic Major
text: While your MACO is present, if you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Leadership and Security.

text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. Order - Discard a card from hand to make this ship attributes +1 (limit +2) until the end of the turn.

name: Reflections

name: Guardian's Advice
text: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, the player on your right places the top card of your dilemma pile beneath one of his or her non-headquarters missions. You may spend 2 additional counters each turn.

name: Multidimensional Transporter Device
text: Order - Destroy this equipment to exchange your personnel present with a personnel in your hand. Both of those personnel must have the same card title.

name: Alien Conspiracy
text: Choose three personnel. Your opponent chooses one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Captured by the Breen
text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are placed in your opponent's brig. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Necessary Evil
text: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Remove one of your personnel from the game. Destroy this event.

name: Weyoun "Defective" Clone
skills: Diplomacy Honor Intelligence Law Leadership Security

text: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Battleship Captain
skills: Archaeology 2 Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer Security

skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Leadership Navigation Officer Security
text: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, this personnel is attributes +2.

text: Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon
text: Plays on a mission. At the start of each player's turn, that player removes a personnel he or she commands at this mission from the game and moves this event to a different mission. When this event is placed on a headquarters mission, remove it from the game.

name: Bareil Antos Petty Thief
skills: Anthropology Biology Law Navigation Programming Security
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Anthropology personnel, he is cost -2. Order - Discard a personnel who has cost of 4 or more from hand to take a card that has a cost of 4 or more from your discard pile into hand.

name: Julian Bashir Rebel Captain
skills: Biology Exobiology Leadership Medical Officer Science
text: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent. For each headquarters mission he or she commands, this personnel is cost -3.

name: Leeta Enticing Rebel
text: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may download a card and place it in your discard pile.

name: Key to the Alpha Quadrant
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Diplomacy, and Officer or Leadership, Security, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands Mouth of the Wormhole, he or she scores 5 points.

name: New Advancements
text: Unless you have Diplomacy, Leadership, and Navigation or a ship at a completed space mission, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Earth}, he or she may download two [SF] cards.

name: Shattered
text: Unless you have Anthropology, Leadership, and Science or Engineer, Transporters, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left does not command a headquarters mission, he or she may take a [Voy] personnel from his or her discard pile and place him or her aboard a ship at a [DQ] mission.

name: The Secret War
text: Unless you have Honor, Officer, and Integrity>34, or Security, Treachery, and Strength>34, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Athos IV}, that personnel is returned to his or her owner's hand instead.

name: Paradan Replicant
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel is non-unique, remove all copies of that personnel in hand from the game, search your deck for any additional copies of that personnel, remove them from the game as well, and shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Security Weapons
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel has a cost of 2 or less, kill him or her instead.

name: One Man Cannot Summon the Future
text: Plays in your core. When you play an [AU] card, if you command two non-[AU] personnel, you may draw a card and then place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: To Be a Warrior
text: Plays in your core. When your Klingon who has a cost of 4 or more is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may destroy this event instead.

name: Vorta Experiment Tables
text: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. Each personnel you own who costs 4 or more gains [AU]. When you complete a mission that requires Cunning, you may score 5 points.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Gateway Historical Research
text: At the start of your turn, if this is your first turn and any opponent has had a turn, you may download a personnel.

name: Damar Cardassian Liberator
text: When you play this personnel, examine cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost of a personnel you command. Take up to two cards examined into your hand. Discard the remaining cards.

name: Lam
text: To play this personnel, stop any number of your personnel that have a total cost of 4 or more.

name: Pavel A. Chekov Treacherous Underling
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to make each player draw two cards, then place two cards from hand on the bottom of his or her deck in any order.

name: Uhura Unprincipled Technician
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player discard two cards from hand.

name: Jera
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [Rom] ship. When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, return her to her owner's hand.

name: Data Tempted by Flesh
skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Programming Science Treachery
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may return this personnel to your hand. If you do not, remove this personnel from the game.

name: Prisoner of the Exile
text: Choose a personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship
text: While your [Fed] Medical personnel is aboard this ship, it is Range +5. While your [Fut] personnel aboard is attempting a space mission, you may destroy your Decay event to make that personnel gain a skill required by that mission until the end of this turn.

name: Kira Nerys First Officer
text: Order - If you command two missions worth 40 or more points, discard four cards from hand to take a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile and place it on your headquarters mission. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Vascular Pad
text: When your personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place this equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck to prevent that.

name: Sector 21396 Commandeer Prototype
skills: Intelligence, Officer, Treachery, and Cunning>33 or Leadership, 2 Officer, and Cunning>35
text: When you complete this mission, you may download a ship and place it at this mission (that ship is stopped). Name an affiliation. The downloaded ship becomes the named affiliation.

name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose
text: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard this ship. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed. Then unstop this ship and all personnel aboard this ship. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn. Also, this ship is Range +9 until the end of this turn.

name: Eris Duplicitous Vorta
text: When you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1. When you begin combat involving this personnel, randomly select an opponent's personnel present to be excluded from that combat.

name: Distant Control
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, name an event or interrupt. Opponents cannot play that named card. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event.

name: Military Assault Command Operations
text: Download a MACO. Destroy this event.

name: Moral Choice
text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel is a [Fed] personnel, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Expand Business Opportunities
skills: Acquisition, Anthropology, and (Diplomacy and Cunning>30 or Treachery and Strength>30)
text: When you end a mission attempt at this mission, your opponent to your left may place the top two cards of his or her dilemma pile under this mission to score 5 points.

name: Gowron Celebrated Leader
text: When you play this personnel, if you command three events, he is cost -1. Order - Stop eight of your Honor Klingons to score 5 points.

name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship
text: Order - Examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Persistent dilemmas you own beneath an opponent's missions. Set any number of those cards aside face down. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck and place those cards on top of your deck in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty
text: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While a personnel you command aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a [Pa] personnel from hand to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype
text: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a Decay event from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets
text: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When you complete this mission, you may destroy an event. (If that event is your event, you may download an event with a cost of 4 or more.)

name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype
text: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, it is Weapons +3 until the end of the turn and you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel
text: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While you have a captive, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Kronos One
text: Order - If your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, search your dilemma pile and remove a Persistent dilemma from the game to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of the turn. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge
text: While three of your [NA] personnel are aboard this ship, it is Range +2 and when you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Part of One Big Happy Fleet
text: Order - Discard a [NA] personnel from hand to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype
text: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Ezri Dax Resourceful Counselor
text: If you command {Jadzia Dax}, place this personnel in her owner's discard pile. Your [DS9] personnel and [E] personnel present cannot be killed by dilemmas that cost 3 or more.

name: Shocking Betrayal
text: Choose a personnel to be stopped and your opponent may discard a non-[NA] personnel from hand to choose a personnel that is the same affiliation as that discarded personnel to be killed.

name: Spatial Distortions
text: Choose a personnel to be placed in your discard pile.

name: Toe to Toe
text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you stop that personnel and another personnel with the same cost, he or she is killed.

name: Disruptive Presence
text: Discard a personnel from hand to download a personnel with the same affiliation as that discarded personnel, then discard a random card from hand. Destroy this event.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J
text: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Dear Friends
text: When a [DS9] personnel you command is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, discard an [E] personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Geordi La Forge Retired Engineer
text: While this personnel is facing a Damage dilemma, you may lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Deja Q
text: Plays in your core. When you reveal a Consume dilemma from your dilemma stack, you may take a Consume dilemma you own from beneath an opponent's completed mission and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Vacation from the Continuum
text: To play this event, you must command a Q event. Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, you may destroy your other Q event to draw five extra dilemmas.

name: Silaran Prin Between Darkness and Light
text: Order - Name a personnel. When an opponent plays that personnel, you may place this personnel in his owner's discard pile to kill that personnel. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Kasidy Yates Conflicted Captain
text: While present with four [Maq] personnel, each [Maq] personnel present is Strength +2.

name: Rule of Acquisition #33
text: When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, say "It never hurts to suck up to the boss" to choose one - make that personnel attributes +2 until the end of the turn; or replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 3 Acquisition.

name: Silent Strike
text: To play this interrupt, you must command a staffed ship that has been on {Engage Cloak} since the start of your turn. Order - Take your staffed ship off Engage Cloak to place it at a non-headquarters mission where an opponent's ship is at and begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard that ship. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: The Doctor Emergency Command Hologram
text: When you play this personnel, choose one - remove a Damage card from one of your ships, or download a Maneuver.

name: Tuvix Symbiogenesis
skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Law Navigation Security
text: To play this personnel, remove two of your personnel at this mission from the game. You cannot play personnel with the same title as those personnel.

name: Neurogenic Field
text: Choose a personnel who has Anthropology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Night Terrors
text: Choose a personnel who has Medical or Science to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Nog Little Green Man
text: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, he cannot be stopped or killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more.

name: Rom Little Green Man
text: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, if he is attempting a mission worth 40 or more points, he is attributes +2 and gains one of every skill he already has.

name: D'Vela
text: While a personnel present is facing a dilemma, if you have no cards in your hand, you may destroy your event to have that personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Kelby Industrious Engineer
text: When this personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, if you have no cards in your hand, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: Tallera Covert Isolationist
text: When you complete this mission, if it is worth 40 or more points, you may score 5 points.

name: Sela Cunning Strategist
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if this mission is worth 40 or more points, you may meet that dilemma's Integrity or Strength requirements using Cunning instead.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Elude Federation Forces
skills: 2 Astrometrics, 2 Navigation, and Strength>32 or Engineer, 2 Programming, Treachery, and Cunning>32
text: When you complete this mission, if you command four [Maq] personnel at this mission, score 10 points.

name: Purchase Moon
text: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 4 Acquisition, you may place a card from hand beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Cargo Pirates
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if your opponent commands three Thief personnel, choose an additional personnel to be stopped.
