name: Inferiority
text: Place this dilemma in your core. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, your opponent may remove this dilemma from the game to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Prefix Codes
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this mission attempt, if there are no damage markers on any of your ships at this mission, choose one of those ships and place this dilemma on it. Otherwise, overcome this dilemma. Damage - This ship is Shields -10.

name: In a Mirror, Darkly
text: Lose 5 points to shuffle each personnel and ship you own in your discard pile into your deck and then draw cards until you have seven cards in hand. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: One Man Can Summon the Future
text: Plays in your core. When you play a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, examine the top five cards of your deck and replace them in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Sarek Logical Being
text: When you play this personnel, each player takes a Consume or Persistent dilemma he or she owns from beneath a mission and returns it to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Sarek Vulcan Delegate
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw a card for each mission you command that is worth 40 or more points.

name: D'Nesh Manipulative Gift
text: While a Thief present is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your event to make that Thief attributes +1 until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Harrad-Sar Slave of the Situation
text: When you play this personnel, you may download up to three Thief personnel.

name: Maras
text: While a Thief present is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may destroy your event to prevent that.

name: Navaar Experienced Gift
text: When a Thief present is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your event to have that Thief gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Neras Slave Girl
text: When you play this personnel, you may draw two cards.

name: Back to Basics
text: Your opponent counts each personnel and ship card in his or her discard pile and shuffles each of those cards into his or her deck. If fourteen or more cards were shuffled into his or her deck this way, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Ghost Stories
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a non-dual dilemma. Your copies of that dilemma have: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.)

name: Reclaim Terok Nor
text: Plays in your core. Each [Car] personnel and [Dom] personnel you own gains [TN]. At the start of each of your turns, place a card from hand on this event.

name: The New Occupation
text: Plays in your core. While your [Car] personnel or [Dom] personnel is attempting a mission aboard your [TN] ship, you may place your Dissident on this event to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Katherine Pulaski Chief Medical Officer
text: When any number of your personnel present are about to be killed by a dilemma, you may shuffle each of those personnel into your deck instead.

name: Hugh Rogue Borg
skills: Anthropology Engineer Exobiology Honor Leadership Programming
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your equipment present to add its cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of the turn.

name: Nanclus Co-Conspirator
text: Order - Choose an opponent to reveal his or her hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 (if a [Fed] personnel is revealed this way he may gain a skill of your choice as well) until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Clarity
text: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. When your Consume dilemma places any number of dilemmas beneath an opponent's mission, you may destroy this event to choose one of those dilemmas and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Odo The Great Link's Savior
skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Law Leadership Programming 2 Security
text: When this personnel is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may have each opponent score 5 points to prevent that.

name: Gorkon Visionary Chancellor
text: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Borg Queen Obsessed
skills: Biology Diplomacy Exobiology 2 Leadership Science 2 Treachery
text: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Exobiology or Science, she is cost -4. This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your [Bor] ship that she is aboard.

name: Gatherers' Raid
text: Plays in your core. Order - Place a card from hand on this event to reveal a number of cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of Gatherers you command. For each event and interrupt revealed this way, you may draw a card.

name: Data Lucasian Chair
skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Physics Programming 2 Science
text: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Five Year Mission
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [TOS] card, you may place a [TOS] card from hand on this event to make that card cost -1. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Walk the Line
text: Plays in your core. When your [Baj][DS9] personnel is about to be stopped, you may place your [Fed][DS9] personnel on this event to prevent that. When your [Fed][DS9] personnel is about to be stopped, you may place your [Baj][DS9] personnel on this event to prevent that.

name: Hall of Warriors
text: To play this event, you must command three [Kli] personnel. Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement, place the top card of your deck on this event. Each of your [Kli] ships is attributes +1 for each card on this event.

name: Improvised Modifications
text: Plays in your core. Order - Place your [Fed][Maq] personnel on top of this event to make each of your [Maq] ships attributes +1 until the end of turn and each opponent chooses a personnel he or she commands to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: The Reckoning
text: Plays in your core. While your [Baj] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a Prophet card or a Pah-wraith card from your hand on this event to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Standard Orbit
text: To play this event, you must command two missions worth 40 or more points. Plays in your core. When an opponent is about to download a card, he or she can only download from the top ten cards of his or her deck. When an opponent discards a personnel from your hand or from the top of your deck, you may place him or her on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: Good Shepherd
text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may stop your [Voy] Commander to download a non-unique [Voy] personnel or a [Voy] personnel who costs 1 or less and place them on this event. When this event is destroyed, place each personnel here aboard your [Voy] ship.

name: Straight and Steady
text: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel aboard a [SF] ship uses a skill to complete a mission worth 40 or more points, you may place a card from hand on this event. Order - Destroy this event to download a card that has a cost equal to the number of cards on this event.

name: Aid Lost Colony
text: This mission is worth 10 fewer points for each other mission you command that does not require Biology, Diplomacy, or Leadership.

name: Risa Shore Leave
skills: Anthropology, and (Archaeology, Science, Treachery, and Cunning>36 or Diplomacy, Exobiology, Officer, and Integrity>32)
text: When you complete this mission, score 5 points for each different species of personnel who uses his or her skills to complete this mission.

name: Juxtaposition
text: Your opponent may return up to two Persistent dilemmas he or she owns from beneath one of your completed missions to his or her dilemma pile and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Are You Offering Me ... a Bribe?
text: To play this event, lose 5 points. Plays in your core. Your [Fer] personnel may meet Integrity and Strength requirements of your missions and each dilemma you face at those missions using Cunning instead. Your [Fer] personnel may attempt and complete your missions.

name: Quark's Advice
text: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar. Destroy this event.

name: Crell Moset Notorious Exobiologist
text: When your [Car] personnel present is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard a non-[Car] personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Founder Leader Single-Minded
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a Morph card from hand to exchange a Founder in your hand with a Founder present.

name: Benjamin Finney Bitter Records Officer
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to name a skill. Each player reveals his or her hand and places each revealed personnel with that skill on top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Stewart Rivers Patriotic Engineer
text: Order - Discard a Decay event from hand to download an non-Decay event or interrupt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Mot The Barber
text: When your six personnel present attempt a mission, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw and one from the total cost he or she may spend on dilemmas.

name: Sirna Kolrami Famed Strategist
text: While facing a dilemma, a personnel present may lose all of his or her skills until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Caretaker's Wave
text: Unless you have Astrometrics and Engineer or 3 Navigation, stop all of your personnel and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, the owner of this dilemma may place this ship at your mission.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Restore Errant Moon
text: When you begin a mission attempt at this mission, each player may search his or her dilemma pile and set aside a Consume dilemma, shuffle his or her dilemma pile, and then place that dilemma on top of his or her dilemma pile.

name: Chang Gorkon's Chief of Staff
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may have him lose 2 Treachery to make him gain Diplomacy and Law until the end of this turn.

name: Soval Vulcan Ambassador
skills: Anthropology 2 Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Science
text: While present with two [SF] personnel or two Vulcans, this personnel cannot be stopped or killed by dilemmas that cost 3 or more.

name: Leeta Union Member
text: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may take the top card of the opponent on your left's dilemma pile and place it beneath your mission that is worth 40 or more points.

name: Leosa Grifter
text: Order - Stop this personnel and choose an opponent to make that opponent choose a Hologram he or she commands and return him or her to his or her owner's hand.

name: Old Differences
text: When you reveal this dilemma from the dilemma stack, if this mission is worth 35 or less points, it is cost -1. Randomly select two personnel to be stopped.

name: Nevala
text: While aboard a ship that has four or more staffing icons, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Kir'Shara
text: When your Dissident present is stopped by a dilemma, you may make each player discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: A Few Minor Difficulties
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a non-[Voy] ship. Each player ignores that ship's game text. When a player scores points, he or she may lose 5 points to destroy this event.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Follow Homing Beacon
skills: Engineer, Programming, Transporters, (Honor or Treachery), 2 Androids and Cunning>35
text: Each {Unscientific Method} revealed here is cost -2.

name: Sylvia
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1 (-2 for each Decay event). Unless you have 2 Leadership, Officer, Security, and Cunning>38 or 2 Engineer, Programming, and 2 Science, randomly select two personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Ceti Alpha V Find Lifeless World
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [SF] personnel with these requirements: Honor, Leadership, 2 Security and Strength>35. At the start of each of your turns, you may discard six cards from hand to draw five cards.

name: Chula: The Chandra
text: Randomly select a personnel. Repeat this until you select a personnel with a cost equal to or greater than the first personnel that you selected. Stop each selected personnel.

name: The Phage
text: Choose a personnel to be placed in your discard pile.

name: The Clown: Guillotine
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel with that skill. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, randomly select a second personnel with that skill. Each selected personnel is killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Clark Terrell Reliant Captain
text: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Reliant}. While you command a [NA] ship, this personnel becomes [NA].

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Sphere 41 Eliminate Sphere Network
skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Security, and Cunning>40 or Engineer, 2 Leadership, and Strength>46

name: Advanced Tactical Training
text: When your [Fed][Maq] personnel is facing a dilemma, destroy one of your events to add that event's cost to that personnel's attributes until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Talak'talan Keen Third
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 40 or more points, if he is present with a Founder and a Vorta, he is attributes +2.

name: Winn Adami Religious Opportunist
text: Order - Remove an event in your discard pile from the game to take a Consume dilemma or Persistent dilemma you own from beneath an opponent's completed mission and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Benjamin Sisko Bold Captain
text: While at a mission worth 40 or more points, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Stripped Down
text: Your opponent moves up to two dilemmas from beneath this mission to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Covenant
text: When your [Baj] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, remove a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile from the game to make that Treachery personnel gain all skills and attributes on that [Baj] personnel removed from the game until the end of this mission attempt.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Navigate Xindi Corridor
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Science, a [Fut] personnel and Cunning>31
text: When you move to your Region: Delphic Expanse mission, if this mission is completed, that mission is span -1.

name: Patrol Neutral Zone
text: When you complete this mission, score 5 points for each Region: Neutral Zone mission you command that does not have an opponent's ship at it.

name: Beverly Crusher Captain Picard
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 40 or more points, she is attributes +1 and gains Medical.

name: Worf Governor of H'atoria
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 aboard your [TNG] ship. When your Honor personnel present is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Parek Privileged Legate
text: When this personnel gains a skill, he may gain any one skill of your choice until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Harsh Conditions (Promo)
text: For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent names a skill. Place this dilemma on this mission. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use those skills. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Timescape (Promo)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Rule of Acquisition #144 (Promo)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may take two cards from beneath your {Ferenginar} and place them in your discard pile to make that personnel gain any skill until the end of that dilemma.

name: Tasha Yar Tactical Officer (Promo)
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may place her on top of her owner's deck to prevent one of your personnel present from being stopped by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: Kahless The Greatest Warrior of Them All (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Integrity and Cunning requirements of that dilemma using Strength instead.

name: Palor Toff Trader (Promo)
text: This personnel is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command.

name: Michael Eddington Loyal Leader (Promo)
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may make him attributes +3 and gain Honor and Leadership. If you do, he is killed at the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Collapse Anti-Time Anomaly (Promo)
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Leadership, Physics, and Cunning>36
text: When your personnel attempt this mission, if there are no dilemmas overcome beneath it, you may download a Q card.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Explore Black Cluster (Promo)
skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Feldomite Rush (Promo)
skills: Engineer, Geology, Cunning>28, and (Acquisition or Law or 2 Treachery)

name: Investigate Maquis Activity (Promo)
text: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet. When you complete this mission, if you have completed no other missions, score 5 points.

name: Data Aspirer (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he is Integrity +2 and gains Honor.

name: James T. Kirk Living Legend (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that has requirements you cannot meet, you may kill this personnel to prevent any further effects of that dilemma and overcome it.

name: Brunt FCA Liquidator (Promo)
text: Order - If an opponent commands more events in his or her core than you, return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an event.

name: Charles Tucker III "Trip" (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he gains Leadership and Security.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Personal Flagship (Promo)
text: When you complete a mission requiring Honor or Leadership, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points (or score 10 points if that mission requires both).

name: Agonizing Encounter (Promo)
text: For each headquarters you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Your opponent names a skill. For each of your missions that requires that skill, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner? (Promo)
text: Choose a personnel who has Diplomacy or Integrity>6 to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Tragic Turn (Promo)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma is overcome here, if that dilemma killed any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be killed. Otherwise, if that dilemma stopped any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be stopped.

name: Getting Under Your Skin (Promo)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play an event in your core, you may reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arridor "Great Sage" (Promo)
skills: Acquisition Anthropology Exobiology Leadership Medical Physics Treachery
text: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a personnel, make this personnel gain all of the revealed personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Nel Apgar Temperamental Researcher (Promo)
text: When you play this personnel, you may draw three cards, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Serova Warp Field Theorist (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each of your other Engineer personnel present is Cunning +1.

name: In the Pah-wraith's Wake (Promo)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Remove two events in your discard pile from the game to destroy an event in an opponent's core. Destroy this event.

name: Abduction (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your two [Bor] Security personnel present together at a non-Headquarters mission to name a skill. Randomly select an opponent's personnel present who has that skill and take command of him or her.

name: Desperate Sacrifice (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. Order - If you command four events, destroy this event to make each player choose two events he or she commands, then destroy each other event he or she commands.

name: Mission Accomplished (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, if you command a staffed ship at that mission with its Commander aboard, score 5 points.

name: Morik (Promo)
text: The cost of the event in your core that has the highest cost is added to this personnel's attributes.

name: Dukat Military Advisor (Promo)
text: Order - Place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Explorer (Promo)
text: Order - Place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order to draw a card.

name: Gowron Leader of the High Council (Promo)
text: When you play this personnel, you may download an Honor Klingon.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Amnesty Talks (Promo)
skills: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Law and Integrity>31 or Leadership, Security, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>36

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Fissure Research (Promo)
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Science, and Cunning>36

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Investigate Alien Probe (Promo)
Crensen Gap Protect the Escapees (Promo)
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Leadership, Officer, Treachery, and Strength>30.

name: Destiny Reset (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event and remove those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile for up to two dilemmas whose total cost does not exceed the number of dilemmas you removed. Place those dilemmas on your dilemma stack in any order. Then shuffle your dilemma pile.

name: Earth Lush and Beautiful Home (Promo)
skills: You may play [TOS] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When you play a [TOS] card here, you may spend a counter to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: No Kill I (Promo)
text: All your personnel are stopped.

name: Chula: The Dice (Promo)
text: Unless you have a personnel with Integrity>6, a second personnel with Cunning>6, and a third personnel with Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Elim Garak Federation Agent *VAP
text: Your Intelligence personnel present are each attributes +1.

name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite *VAP
text: Order - Examine the bottom card of any player's deck.

name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous (Promo)
text: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your Hand Weapons aboard the completing ship in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

name: Agonizing Encounter *(Promo)
text: For each headquarters you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Your opponent names a skill. For each of your missions that requires that skill, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Tragic Turn *(Promo)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma is overcome here, if that dilemma killed any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be killed. Otherwise, if that dilemma stopped any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be stopped.

name: Ro Laren Maquis Sympathizer (Promo)
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may choose an opponent to place two random cards from hand on top of his or her deck.

name: Elim Garak Plain, Simple Tailor (Promo)
text: When this personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a personnel from hand to take this personnel into your hand instead.

name: Dukat Liberator and Protector (Promo)
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, each of your opponents discards the top three cards of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain (Promo)
skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Navigation Officer
text: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Sela Devious Schemer (Promo)
text: While an opponent's Security personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that Security.

name: Worf First Officer (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard two cards from hand to exchange a [TNG] personnel you own present with a [TNG] personnel who has the same cost from your hand.

name: Deanna Troi Major Rakal (Promo)
text: While this personnel is present with a [Rom] Dissident personnel, she is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence, Leadership and Security.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Remarkable Man (Promo)
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if you have completed no missions, each of your personnel present is attributes +2.

name: Borg Queen Bringer of Order (Promo)
text: Order - Discard the top card of your deck to name a skill. Each of your Borg gains that skill. This effect lasts until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Benjamin Sisko Man of Resolve (Promo)
text: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy and gains Treachery until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arik Soong Father of Many (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you are about to lose command of one of your Genetically Enhanced personnel present, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: Quark Son of Keldar (Promo)
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to begin combat involving this personnel, comparing total Cunning instead of Strength. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Seven of Nine Representative of the Hive (Promo)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she is Strength +2 and gains Security.

name: The Edge of Forever (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. Order - Lose 5 points to choose one: download a [Fut] card that could be played at your headquarters mission and place it there; or take a [Pa] card from your discard pile that could be played at your headquarters mission and place it there. Destroy this event.

name: In the Pah-wraith's Wake *(Promo)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Remove two events in your discard pile from the game to destroy an event in an opponent's core. Destroy this event.

name: Party Atmosphere (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. When a player plays an event in his or her core, he or she chooses an opponent. For each headquarters mission that opponent commands, that event is cost -1.

name: Unexpected Difficulties (Promo)
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to return them to your dilemma pile and draw an equal number of dilemmas.

name: Skeleton Crew (Promo)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. To begin a mission attempt at this mission, you must have at least six personnel involved. When you complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Miramanee Loyal Priestess *VAP
text: Order - Kill this personnel to destroy an event on this mission.

name: Athos IV Maquis Base (Promo)
skills: You may play [Maq] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {For the Cause}.

name: Bajor Gift of the Prophets (Promo)
skills: You may play [Baj] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World (Promo)
skills: You may play [Car] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation (Promo)
skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Home of Starfleet Command (Promo)
skills: You may play [Fed][DS9] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Humanity's Home (Promo)
skills: You may play [SF] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When you complete a space mission, if no other space mission has been completed, score 10 points.

name: Ferenginar Financial Hub (Promo)
skills: You may play [Fer] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When you place a card beneath this mission, place it face down. Dilemmas cannot be placed beneath this mission. Cards beneath this mission are not in play.

name: Founders' Homeworld Home of the Great Link (Promo)
skills: You may play [Dom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9 (Promo)
skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Terok Nor (Promo)
skills: You may play [TN] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire (Promo)
skills: You may play [Kli] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Romulus Seat of Power (Promo)
skills: You may play [Rom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Unicomplex Root of the Hive Mind (Promo)
skills: You may play [Bor] cards and equipment at this mission.
text: You cannot command another Headquarters mission.

name: Odo Constable (Promo)
skills: Honor Law Leadership Navigation 2 Programming 2 Security
text: While an opponent's Thief or Treachery personnel is at this mission, that personnel cannot use his or her abilities.

name: Elim Garak Agent of the Obsidian Order (Promo)
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a personnel from hand to give him one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Argo Pilot (Promo)
skills: Archaeology Diplomacy Honor Leadership Navigation Officer
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to download {Escape}.

keywords: Commander: I.K.S. Rotarran. General. High Council Member.
name: Martok Soldier of the Empire (Promo)
text: Each of your [Kli] ships at this mission is Weapons +1.

name: Shinzon Capable Commander (Promo)
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to take a Maneuver card from your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Prototype Warship (Promo)
text: While this ship is in an engagement, it is Weapons +1 and Shields +2.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Federation Envoy (Promo)
text: When you complete a [Fed] planet mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears (Promo)
text: For each Honor Klingon aboard this ship, it is Weapons +1 (limit +3).

name: Scimitar Predator (Promo)
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser discards the top card or his or her deck.

name: Tuvok Undercover
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and you have a [Maq] personnel present, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence.

name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to choose one: draw two cards; or take a [Maq] personnel from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Spock Trainee Instructor
skills: Biology Honor Leadership Officer Physics Science
text: When a Damage card is about to be placed on your ship that this personnel is aboard, you may kill him to remove it from the game instead.

name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker
text: When a dilemma is about to be revealed, if this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove him from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Jasad
text: While this personnel is aboard your [Car] ship, that ship is attributes +1 for each of your different Capture cards and each of your different Punishment cards.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Genesis Planet
skills: Geology, Cunning>42 and (Biology, 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 2 Security, Transporters and 2 Treachery)
text: Order - If this mission is completed, lose 5 points to make this a space mission. Kill all personnel (and destroy all equipment) on this mission.

name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1 and gains Honor.

name: Khan!
text: When an opponent scores 5 or more points, if he or she has not completed a mission, he or she loses 5 points.

name: The Genesis Effect
text: Plays on your mission. When you play this event, name a dilemma. When your personnel face that dilemma at this mission, prevent and overcome it.

name: No-Win Situation
text: Plays in your core. When your dilemma is prevented or its requirements are met, randomly select an opponent's personnel that was facing that dilemma to be stopped.

name: Learning Curve
text: Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if you played two or more [Maq] personnel this turn, place two cards from the top of your deck on this event. You may play cards from this event as though there were in your hand.

keywords: Replicate - Discard an event from your hand.
name: Cellular Peptide Cake
text: To play this event, you must command a Klingon. Each player returns a non-[Ref] event in an opponent's core to its owner's hand. Destroy this event.

name: Blow You Out of the Stars
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. That opponent may place one of his or her unique personnel involved in your brig to prevent this and destroy this event. If you do not win, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Unbelievable Emergency
text: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select two personnel to be stopped. If either of those personnel that is selected has the named skill, kill that personnel instead.

name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel your opponent chose on the top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Subterranean Barrier
text: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, Geology and Integrity>25 or Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Not Quite Domesticated Pets
text: Unless you have Diplomacy, 2 Leadership and Integrity>28 or Biology, 2 Exobiology and Cunning>34, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent has more events in his or her core than you and he or she does not command that personnel, place that personnel at his or her headquarters mission instead and that opponent now commands that personnel.

name: Final Triumph
text: Unless you choose to discard an event from your hand, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Accelerated Aging
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission cannot use his or her first-listed skill. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Destined Journey
text: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Leadership to be stopped. If that personnel has both Honor and Leadership, you may unstop your stopped personnel present and that personnel joins the mission attempt. If you cannot choose a personnel with Honor or Leadership, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Assassination Attempt (AC)
text: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who does not have Treachery is killed.

name: Nanite Attack (AC)
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Engineer or 2 Security and a Hand Weapon, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the end of each of your turns, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus? (AC)
text: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

name: Amanda Rogers (AC)
text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Lose 5 points.

name: Kevin Uxbridge (AC)
text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. Order - Destroy an event. Lose 5 points.

name: Winn Adami Kai of Bajor (AC)
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to place a non-[Baj] personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ocett Dogged Rival (AC)
skills: Archaeology Exobiology Navigation Officer Science Treachery
text: When you play this personnel, you may discard the top card of your deck to place any other card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Borath Psychological Researcher (AC)
text: Order - Examine a random card from an opponent's hand. If it is a personnel, draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Luther Sloan Man of Secrets (AC)
text: Order - Destroy your event and return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: Thomas Riker Defiant Leader (AC)
text: While this personnel is aboard your [Fed] ship, it is Range +2.

name: Nu'Daq Tenacious Rival (AC)
skills: Archaeology Exobiology Leadership Navigation Officer Treachery
text: When you play this personnel, you may discard a card from hand to take a card from your discard pile into hand.

name: The Albino Killer of Children (AC)
text: Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to kill an opponent's Honor personnel present.

name: The Viceroy Shinzon's Protector (AC)
skills: Exobiology Geology Leadership Medical Telepathy Treachery
text: When you play {Shinzon} or another Reman at this mission, you may examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Queen's Borg Cube (AC)
text: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: Bralek (AC)
text: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Stolen Warship (AC)
text: Order - If this ship is staffed and at a non-headquarters mission, this mission's owner places a card from hand on top of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Maht-H'a (AC)
text: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

name: Scimitar Predator (AC)
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser discards the top card or his or her deck.

name: Tsiolkovsky Infection
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Anthropology, 2 Programming, and Cunning>38 or 2 Biology, Exobiology, and 2 Medical, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Whisper in the Dark
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Geology, 2 Physics, and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, 2 Officer, and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: All-Out War
text: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved.

name: Anything or Anyone
text: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. You may only execute one order using this event each turn. Order - Place an Infiltrator from hand on this event. (You now command that personnel.) Order - Place an Infiltrator from this event aboard an opponent's ship or on an opponent's planet mission.

name: Storage Compartment
text: Plays in your core. When you have chosen dilemmas, you may place one unused planet dilemma or space dilemma on this event instead of beneath your dilemma pile. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may take any dilemmas from this event and add them to those drawn.

name: You've Always Been My Favorite
text: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you play this event, download up to five cards, then place them on this event. You may spend 1 counter to take a card on this event into your hand. When there are no cards on this event, destroy it.

name: Knowledge and Experience
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Dukat Anjohl Tennan
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may remove an Anthropology or Leadership personnel in your discard pile from the game to make this personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Kira Nerys Iliana Ghemor
text: Order - Lose 5 points and stop this personnel to download up to three Dissident personnel, then place them on a headquarters mission where they could be played.

name: Odo Impartial Investigator
text: Order - If this personnel is at a non-headquarters mission, lose 5 points and stop him to place an opponent's non-Honor personnel present in your brig.

name: Odo Founder Adept Imposter
text: When you are about to place an Infiltration card in your discard pile, if this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, you may place that Infiltration card on top of your deck instead.

name: Guinan Listener
text: When you play this personnel, each player scores 5 points.

name: Jadzia Dax Problem Solver
text: When you are about to place an event in your discard pile, you may stop this personnel to place it on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: William T. Riker Exchange Officer
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make him gain a skill from your Klingon present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Crosis Fanatical Lieutenant
text: For each event you command beyond the number of events an opponent of your choice commands, this personnel is attributes +1 (limit +6).

name: Lore The One
skills: Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Programming Security 2 Treachery
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he cannot be stopped.

name: B'Etor Romulan Conspirator
text: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may unstop a stopped [Rom] personnel present. That personnel joins this mission attempt.

name: Lursa Romulan Conspirator
text: When you other [Rom] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, this personnel may gain one of his or her skills until the end of that mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kelvan Show of Force (R2)
text: Your opponent chooses two personnel (except an Android or a Hologram). Randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Maglock (R2)
text: Unless you have 3 Officer or 3 Programming, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Personal Duty (R2)
text: Unless you have Leadership or Officer, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Leadership or Officer, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Escape (R2)
text: When any number of your personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed or placed in an opponent's brig, discard a random card from hand to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Secret Conspiracy (R2)
text: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, add the skills (except Intelligence) of your [Rom] Intelligence personnel at that mission to the mission's requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent's turn.

name: Bareil Antos Esteemed Vedek (R2)
skills: Anthropology Biology 2 Diplomacy 2 Honor Leadership Science
text: Each of your other [Baj] personnel present is Integrity +1 (or +2 while facing a dilemma).

name: Benjamin Sisko The Emissary of the Prophets (R2)
text: When you play another non-Treachery Bajoran at this mission, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kamala The Perfect Mate (R2)
text: Order - This personnel gains one skill from another personnel present. She keeps this skill until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Vash Treasure Hunter (R2)
text: When you play this personnel, you may place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card (or, if {Jean-Luc Picard} is at this mission, draw two cards instead).

name: Face to Face (R2)
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Head to Head (R2)
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Complications (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Confessions in the Pale Moonlight (R2)
text: Plays in your core. While your [Fed][DS9] Treachery personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Machinations (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma that costs no more than the number of dilemmas you removed. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down. Place the chosen dilemma on the top of your dilemma stack.

name: Borum Selfless Hero (R2)
text: Order - Exchange this personnel with a [Baj] Leadership personnel in your discard pile, then remove this personnel from the game.

name: Jake Sisko Temporal Anchor (R2)
skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Biology Physics Programming Science
text: Order - Place this personnel in his owner's discard pile to download a [Fed][DS9] personnel.

name: Roga Danar Decorated Subhadar (R2)
skills: Biology Engineer Leadership Navigation Programming Security
text: When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, place him on top of his owner's deck instead.

name: Gomtuu Shock Wave (R2)
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

name: Overwhelmed (R2)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: I Don't Like to Lose (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may discard a card from hand to subtract up to three dilemmas from the number of dilemmas you may draw and add that same number to the total cost you may spend on dilemmas.

name: The Manheim Effect (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may destroy this event to take an overcome dilemma you own from an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of your dilemma pile.

name: Borg Queen Guardian of the Hive (R2)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may replace your Drone present with a Drone from your discard pile. Place the Drone you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Locutus Voice of the Borg (R2)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if he uses his Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer, or Treachery to meet its requirements, score 10 points.

name: Damar Useful Adjutant (R2)
text: When an opponent is about to draw dilemmas, if this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a card from hand to subtract one from the number he or she can draw. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Dukat Liberator and Protector (R2)
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, each of your opponents discards the top three cards of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bashir Founder Nefarious Saboteur (R2)
skills: Engineer Exobiology Intelligence Medical Physics 2 Treachery
text: When you play an Infiltration card, if this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, you may draw a card.

name: Remata'Klan Unit Leader (R2)
text: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may exclude another [Dom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Weyoun Loyal Subject of the Dominion (R2)
skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Law Leadership Security Treachery
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may draw a card.

name: Michael Eddington Traitor to Starfleet (R2)
text: Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to return an opponent's Leadership personnel present to his or her owner's hand.

name: Quark Resistance Informant (R2)
text: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is facing a dilemma, he may gain a skill from your Dissident present until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Biochemical Hyperacceleration (R2)
text: Randomly select three personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Biology, Geology, and Medical or 2 Security and Strength>38, those personnel are returned to their owner's hand.

name: Broken Captive (R2)
text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her captives. Unless you have the skills on that captive, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Counterinsurgency Program (R2)
text: Your opponent discards any number of event or equipment cards from hand and names a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law or Telepathy) for each one. Unless you have those skills, all your personnel are stopped.

name: In Training (R2)
text: Randomly select a personnel who costs 1 or 2. All other personnel who cost 1 or 2 are stopped.

name: Talosian Trial (R2)
text: Your opponent takes one of his or her planet dilemmas that is overcome beneath one of your missions and places it face down on top of his or her stack of chosen dilemmas.

name: The Dreamer and the Dream (R2)
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome. If at that time this mission has not been completed, its owner discards his or her hand.

name: Tsiolkovsky Infection (R2)
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Anthropology, 2 Programming, and Cunning>38 or 2 Biology, Exobiology, and 2 Medical, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Whisper in the Dark (R2)
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Geology, 2 Physics, and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, 2 Officer, and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: The Sword of Kahless (R2)
text: Each of your Klingons and Honor personnel present is Integrity -2, Cunning +1, and Strength +2.

name: At What Cost? (R2)
text: Lose 5 points to spend 7 additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Endangered (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may lose 5 points and destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Far-Seeing Eyes (R2)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may lose 5 points and destroy this event to examine your opponent's deck and remove two non-ship cards from the game. He or she shuffles and replaces his or her deck.

name: Field Studies (R2)
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fed] personnel at your space mission. Lose 5 points to revel the top two cards of an opponent's dilemma pile. Place face up beneath that mission any dilemmas that could be faced there. Replace the remaining cards in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Running a Tight Ship (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When you attempt a space mission using a ship with its Commander aboard, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw and one from the total cost he or she may spend on dilemmas.

name: Storage Compartment (R2)
text: Plays in your core. When you have chosen dilemmas, you may place one unused planet dilemma or space dilemma on this event instead of beneath your dilemma pile. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may take any dilemmas from this event and add them to those drawn.

name: The Perfect Tool (R2)
text: Plays in your core. During each of your Play and Draw Cards segments, you may spend 1 additional counter for each personnel you command but do not own.

name: Brainwashing (R2)
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Lose 5 points to reveal an opponent's hand. Choose a personnel that you do not command and place him or her on your headquarters mission. (You now command that personnel.)

name: Knowledge and Experience (R2)
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Outlining the Stakes (R2)
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. When you are checking if your personnel can meet a mission's requirements, lose 5 points to subtract a skill from those requirements.

name: The Rite of Emergence (R2)
text: When your Host is attempting a mission, discard two random cards from hand to make him or her gain Treachery and a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Krim Thoughtful Tactician (R2)
text: Order - Lose 5 points and stop this personnel to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to take each copy of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile, place them beneath your completed mission, then shuffle and replace his or her dilemma pile face down.

name: Founder Architect (R2)
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, he is attributes +1 for each event in each player's core (limit +5).

name: Guinan Listener (R2)
text: When you play this personnel, each player scores 5 points.

name: William T. Riker Exchange Officer (R2)
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make him gain a skill from your Klingon present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Crosis Fanatical Lieutenant (R2)
text: For each event you command beyond the number of events an opponent of your choice commands, this personnel is attributes +1 (limit +6).

name: Data Loyal Brother (R2)
text: At the start of each of your turns, you must discard an event from hand or stop this personnel.

name: Lore The One (R2)
skills: Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Programming Security 2 Treachery
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he cannot be stopped.

name: B'Etor Romulan Conspirator (R2)
text: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may unstop a stopped [Rom] personnel present. That personnel joins this mission attempt.

name: Koval Chairman of the Tal Shiar (R2)
skills: Biology Exobiology Intelligence Leadership Security Treachery
text: While an opponent commands more headquarters missions than you, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Lursa Romulan Conspirator (R2)
text: When you other [Rom] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, this personnel may gain one of his or her skills until the end of that mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Tekeny Ghemor Prominent Official *A
skills: Diplomacy Engineer Honor Law Leadership Programming Transporters
text: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop your Dissident present instead.

name: Ascertain *A
text: When your Drone is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand and stop that Drone to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Programming.

name: Temporal Incursion *A
text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may flip your dilemma pile over to draw an extra dilemma. (Cards that were face up on the bottom of your dilemma pile become face down on the top.)

name: Exceed Engine Output *A
text: Plays in your core. Order - Move your ship with your Engineer aboard to a space mission, then place this event on that ship. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2 and Shields -2.

name: Where No One Has Gone Before *A
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, and Cunning>34 or Exobiology, Leadership, Medical, and Integrity>32, place this dilemma in your core and place your ship on this dilemma. At the end of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and place the ship at your headquarters mission.

name: Proximity-Actuated Field *A
text: Unless you have Biology and 2 Security or 2 Physics and Cunning>35, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and your opponent may move up to two dilemmas from beneath one of your missions to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Code of Honor *A
text: Randomly select two personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Law, Security, and Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Omet'iklan Steely Disciplinarian *A
text: When you lose 5 points, you may place two of your Jem'Hadar present in their owner's discard pile to score 5 points. You may do this only once per turn.

name: Montgomery Scott Relic *A
text: While this personnel is equipped with an equipment, each dilemma he faces that requires Programming or Transporters is prevented and overcome.

name: Ishka Moogie *A
text: Order - Examine the top card of your deck and exchange it with a card beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Sovak Treasure Hunter *A
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the discarded card's cost, then replace them in any order.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Worf's cha'Dich *A
text: When your Klingon personnel present is selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Kivas Fajo Collector *A
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Acquisition instead.

name: Vic Fontaine Vegas Crooner *A
text: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may discard a card from hand to subtract one from the total cost your opponent may spend on dilemmas.

name: Spock Celebrated Ambassador *A
text: While this personnel is present with a Dissident, each of your Romulan personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Aurulent *A
text: When this ship is about to move between a non-[GQ] mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Devoras *A
text: When an opponent's personnel is killed, if this ship is at the same mission, you may place a [Rom] personnel from hand who has the same cost aboard this ship.

name: Kurdon *A
text: While your personnel are attempting a space mission that requires Acquisition or Treachery, each [Fer] personnel aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Cardassian Processing *A
text: Unless you have Diplomacy, Honor, and Transporters or Law, Security, and Strength>30, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Cardassia Prime}, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead.

name: Outclassed *A
text: Unless you have unused Range>8 or Weapons>8 all your personnel are stopped.

name: Zero Hour *A
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Add 3 to each attribute requirement needed to complete this mission for each event in your core. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Distracting Exhibition *A
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a skill. While an opponent's personnel is facing your dilemma, if he or she uses that skill, take a dilemma from beneath an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of you dilemma pile. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Latinum Storage *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. During your Discard Excess Cards segment, you may keep one additional card in your hand for each different Rule you command.

name: Reman Subterfuge *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each opponent's Execute Orders segment, that player must discard a card from hand.

name: Remarkable Regeneration *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. While an opponent has more points than you, subtract one from each Consume on each of your dilemmas.

name: Temporal Delineation *A
text: When you are about to draw dilemmas, shuffle your dilemma pile. If you command a [Fut] or [Pa] personnel, you may also spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: First Unstable *A
text: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download an event.

name: Thrax Chief of Security *A
text: When you play a Punishment card, you may draw a card.

name: Wesley Crusher Nova Squadron Pilot *A
text: While this personnel is present with your Cadet, he loses Honor and gains Navigation and Treachery.

name: Shran In Archer's Debt *A
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to take your overcome dilemma and place it on the bottom of your dilemma pile.

name: Silik Chameleon *A
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a random card from hand to make him gain a skill that is required by that dilemma until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jonathan Archer Headstrong Captain *A
skills: Diplomacy Engineer Honor Leadership Officer Security
text: While this personnel is at your [Fed] mission requiring Diplomacy, you may attempt it.

name: U.S.S. Ganges One of the First *A
text: While you command more than seven personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. This ship is attributes +1 for each [DS9] personnel aboard (limit +5).

name: U.S.S. Rio Grande Built to Last *A
text: While you command more than seven personnel aboard this ship, it is range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the range required. While your Engineer is aboard, this ship is Range +1.

name: Enterprise Finally Ready to Swim *A
text: While you have three different species aboard this ship, it is attributes +2.

name: Strafing Fire *A
text: To play this event, you must command two [Maq] ships. Destroy an event in an opponent's core. Then search that opponent's hand and deck and place each copy of that event in its owner's discard pile. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Destroy this event.

name: An Issue of Trust *A
text: Unless you have Honor or Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Honor or Treachery, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Armed Search Party *A
text: Randomly select three personnel. Unless they have Strength>17 or you have a non-Hand Weapon equipment, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select one of those personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Thermokinetic Explosion *A
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, and Cunning>30 or total ship's attributes>21, place this dilemma on your ship and all your personnel are stopped. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, choose an opponent. That opponent may download a Damage card and place it on this ship.

name: A Sight for Sore Eyes *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, score 5 points. At the end of each of your turns, if you have at least 5 points, lose 5 points.

name: Dark Pursuit *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When the player on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt, you may draw one extra dilemma for each Pursuit card you command.

name: The Long Journey Home *A
text: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. When you command four completed [DQ] space missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game.

name: Warp Speed Transfer *A
text: While your personnel aboard a ship are facing a dilemma, move your staffed ship to that mission from a different mission and place one of your personnel aboard that ship aboard the ship attempting the mission. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Second Neonatal Drone *A
text: When your unique Borg present is about to be stopped, you may discard a random card from hand and stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Kathryn Janeway Forceful Captain *A
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, she is attributes +4.

name: The Doctor Emergency Medical Hologram *A
text: When your [Voy] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard two cards from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor *A
text: When an opponent plays an event, you may discard a Romulan from hand to download an event. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer *A
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, you may stop this personnel to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Engineer. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Patrolling Warship *A
text: When an opponent's ship moves to this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard it, that opponent's ship is stopped.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise *A
text: When you complete a [Kli] mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation *A
text: When you play this ship, for each [TNG] Leadership personnel at this mission, this ship is cost -1. Order - Stop your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel aboard this ship and return your event with no cards on it to its owner's hand to have each opponent return one of his or her events with no cards on it to its owner's hand.

name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport *A
text: While you command eight or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters mission and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. Order - Discard two events from hand to make this ship Range +2 until the end of this turn.

name: Quark's Treasure Sabotaged Shuttle *A
text: Order - If this ship has its Commander aboard it, lose 5 points to take an additional turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *A
text: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: No Kill I *A
text: All your personnel are stopped.

name: Psychokinetic Control *A
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission loses each skill he or she has gained. Each personnel cannot gain skills. Each personnel cannot increase his or her attributes. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart *A
text: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Vian Test *A
text: Choose a personnel to place in your opponent's brig. If that personnel is non-unique, your opponent draws up to three cards.

name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain *A
text: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to download two cards. Those cards must be [TOS], Assault, Maneuver, Pursuit, or Temporal cards.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer *A
text: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to take two dilemmas you own from beneath an opponent's mission and return them to your dilemma pile.

name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst *A
text: Order - Examine the top two cards of your deck. Replace those cards in any order. Order - Exchange a card in hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Spock Science Officer *A
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to examine the top four dilemmas of an opponent's dilemma pile and remove one from the game. Replace the remaining cards in the same order.

name: Kang Vigilant Commander *A
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Integrity +2.

name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain *A
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Cunning +2.

name: Kor Courageous Governor *A
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Strength +1.

name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet *A
text: While you have no cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +4, Strength +4, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. Order - Examine and remove two cards in a player's discard pile from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man *A
text: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your unique ship that he is aboard.

name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander *A
text: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is cost -1. When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose one: exclude her from that selection; or exclude a [Pa][Rom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Keras Creature of Duty *A
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may choose an opponent and name a card. That opponent searches his or her deck, places the named card in his or her hand, and shuffles his or her deck.

name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel *A
text: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady *A
text: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +4 to score 5 points.

name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor *A
text: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Rom] personnel. When you move this ship from an opponent's mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, that opponent must discard two cards from hand (limit two cards per turn).

name: Chula: The Dice *A
text: Unless you have a personnel with Integrity>6, a second personnel with Cunning>6, and a third personnel with Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Paranoid Escape *A
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel to be removed from the game. You cannot play cards that have the same title as that personnel. When you complete this mission, put the personnel removed from the game in his or her owner's hand and this dilemma is overcome.

name: The Dal'Rok *A
text: Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon *A
text: Plays on a mission. At the start of each player's turn, that player removes a personnel he or she commands at this mission from the game and moves this event to a different mission. When this event is placed on a headquarters mission, remove it from the game.

name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling *A
text: When you play this personnel, if you command a Treachery personnel, he is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to make him gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Gor Thot *A
text: When you play this personnel, name 1, 2 or 3. Until the start of your next turn, each player cannot play cards that have a cost equal to the named number.

name: Pran Thot *A
skills: Engineer Leadership Medical Navigation Officer Physics
text: When you play this personnel, each player discards any number of cards from hand that have a total cost of 4 or more. If a player cannot, he or she discards his or her entire hand.

name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian *A
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to have him gain any skill of your choice and make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Spock Man of Integrity *A
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: Worf Defiant Commander *A
text: Each of your personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is attributes +1.

name: Slar Gorn Slave Master *A
text: This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each [AU] personnel present.

name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander *A
skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Officer Security 2 Treachery
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if you have no cards in hand, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Discard a card from hand to download {Watch Dog}.

name: T'Pol Not a Slave *A
skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Engineer Leadership Officer Programming Science
text: When you play this personnel, if you command an Officer personnel, this personnel is cost -1. While you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Tykk *A
text: You may play Breen personnel aboard this ship. When a Breen personnel aboard this ship is involved in an engagement you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel with a cost of 4 or more from hand aboard this ship.

name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship *A
text: This ship is attributes +2 for each corresponding Commander aboard it.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship *A
text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *A
text: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship *A
text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. You do not need to spend all your counters on your turns. While you have no cards in your hand, this ship is Range +2.

name: The Clown: Guillotine *A
text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel with that skill. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, randomly select a second personnel with that skill. Each selected personnel is killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Clarity *A
text: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. When your Consume dilemma places any number of dilemmas beneath an opponent's mission, you may destroy this event to choose one of those dilemmas and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Ghost Stories *A
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a non-dual dilemma. Your copies of that dilemma have: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.)

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *A
text: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Data Tempted by Flesh *A
skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Programming Science Treachery
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may return this personnel to your hand. If you do not, remove this personnel from the game.

name: Odo The Great Link's Savior *A
skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Law Leadership Programming 2 Security
text: When this personnel is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may have each opponent score 5 points to prevent that.

name: Data Lucasian Chair *A
skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Physics Programming 2 Science
text: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship *A
text: Order - Examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Persistent dilemmas you own beneath an opponent's missions. Set any number of those cards aside face down. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck and place those cards on top of your deck in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty *A
text: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While a personnel you command aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a [Pa] personnel from hand to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship *A
