text: While your [Fed] Medical personnel is aboard this ship, it is Range +5. While your [Fut] personnel aboard is attempting a space mission, you may destroy your Decay event to make that personnel gain a skill required by that mission until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype *A
text: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a Decay event from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets *A
text: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When you complete this mission, you may destroy an event. (If that event is your event, you may download an event with a cost of 4 or more.)

name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype *A
text: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, it is Weapons +3 until the end of the turn and you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel *A
text: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While you have a captive, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Kronos One *A
text: Order - If your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, search your dilemma pile and remove a Persistent dilemma from the game to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of the turn. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge *A
text: While three of your [NA] personnel are aboard this ship, it is Range +2 and when you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1.

name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose *A
text: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard this ship. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed. Then unstop this ship and all personnel aboard this ship. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn. Also, this ship is Range +9 until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype *A
text: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Benjamin Sisko Shipwright
text: While this personnel is aboard a [Baj] ship, it is Range +1.

name: Borg Queen Perfectionist
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each personnel you command but do not own cannot be stopped.

name: Dukat True Cardassian
text: When an engagement involving this personnel ends, the ship he is aboard and each of your [Car] personnel aboard it are not stopped. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: Kudak'Etan Arrogant First
text: Order - Discard a Vorta from hand to place this personnel and any number of your Jem'Hadar present aboard a ship at the same mission.

name: Data Commanding Officer
text: Order - Discard a card from hand to name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 5 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain
skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Navigation Officer
text: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Gowron Sole Leader of the Empire
text: When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a Treachery Klingon from hand to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arctus Baran Treasure Seeker
text: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may download an Artifact card and place it in your core (if it is an event) or present with this personnel (if it is an equipment).

name: Velal Reluctant Aggressor
text: When the player on your right attempts this mission, if you command a Maneuver event, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Baraka
text: Order - Lose 5 points to make this ship Range +10 until the end of this turn.

name: Queen's Borg Cube
text: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: Naprem
text: While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if your personnel is on that planet, he or she is an Infiltrator.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Commandeered Warship
text: To staff this ship, you must have an [Dom] Engineer personnel aboard. Order - If this ship is staffed and at your mission, stop this ship to take an overcome dilemmas from beneath that mission and place it face up beneath your [AQ] mission.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Explorer
text: When you complete a space mission requiring Diplomacy, if this ship is at that mission, score 10 points.

name: U.S.S. Sutherland
text: When you fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard three cards from hand to place the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile face up beneath this mission. If you do this, you cannot attempt this mission again this turn.

name: I.K.S. Bortas
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a card from hand to download a Maneuver event.

name: Fortune Raider for Hire
text: While your Treachery personnel is aboard this ship, he or she is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command (limit +3).

name: Rovaran
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may examine the loser's hand and choose a card to be removed from the game. Order - Discard a Maneuver card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.

name: Caretaker's Array (Promo)
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {Finding Our Way}. When a card instructs you to place a ship at your headquarters mission, that ship may be placed at this mission instead.

name: Saavik Protegee
text: When you play this personnel, if James T. Kirk is at this mission, you may download {No-Win Situation}.

name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
text: When you win an engagement involving this personnel and there are two or less personnel aboard an opponent's ship involved, you may remove a damage event from that ship to place those personnel in your brig. You now command that ship (it is now a [Kli] ship).

name: Carol Marcus Intelligent Scientist
text: This personnel is Cunning +1 for each card in an opponent's hand (limit +5).

name: David Marcus Young Scientist
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy an event in your core (if you do not, lose 5 points instead).

name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis
text: While present with an opponent's personnel, each of that opponent's personnel is attributes -1.

name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel
text: While this ship is at a [Bor] mission, personnel aboard it are attributes +1. While your Borg Queen is aboard this ship, it is staffed.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior
text: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When this ship is about to move between Earth and another mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation
skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9
skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
text: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire
skills: You may play [Kli] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Romulus Seat of Power
skills: You may play [Rom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Authenticate Artifacts
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Archaeology, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Archaeology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Command Decisions
text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Kolaran Raiders
text: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Security to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Limited Welcome
text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped. Place this dilemma on this mission. When you attempt this mission again, after your opponent draws dilemmas, he or she may take this dilemma and add it to those drawn.

name: Ornaran Threat
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and Medical or 2 Security, that personnel is killed instead, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pinned Down
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be stopped.

name: Systems Diagnostic
text: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Triage
text: Choose a personnel who has Biology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Wavefront
text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Astrometrics or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, your opponent chooses an Astrometrics or Navigation personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Cry "Havoc!"
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: D'Arsay Archive
text: Count the number of cards in your hand, shuffle them, and place them on the bottom of your deck to draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

name: Salvaging the Wreckage
text: Take up to four personnel and ship cards from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: Render Assistance
text: When an engagement involving your ship begins, another one of your ships at that mission joins the engagement.
